Mtowen Sekaliy son nakwav asisinap didumwal wamatan Yowbad. Yam katanok katanok ivna̱ses Yowbad nakaleiwag babaw, iyakousis.
Tage nitus nag, peinan Elisabet vinakal bo ivnavek, o namwam bo itovek.
Tasiyas Abiy delen, anatut waseg iwteles lun Yowbad wanbunatum.
Peinan sikikun ma̱wan, kweitan youd ilavesa mav mo iton yagan mtowen Sekaliy; mo ikow nawotet kweitan, mamagina isiw in Yowbad nabunatum wanuwan, igob gewuw, manisin simasim seikwan.
Gamag meivek-wan watoulan bunatum ikululs ininitougs waseg Yowbad, peinan bo tutan gewuw beigabs.
Mo Yowbad nataka̱yob teitan isap waseg Sekaliy, itoun nakabeigab gewuw wanaka̱tay waseg.
Mtowen Sekaliy ikin, iyow nuwan, anpwa̱yat seikwan.
Mtowen anelos mo idibek, ilana, “O Sekaliy, awoum beivag ampwa̱yat. Yowbad bo iligen mukwanitoug, mukwav Elisabet bo bikop nitumiy, mo bukudok yagan Yon.
“Ya̱koum bukumwa̱saw seikwan simwey babaw gamag bimwa̱saws, mukwav inakopway waseg bikop nitumiy.
“Mtowen natum bo bitawtoun wamatan Yowbad. Nag beimoum wayn o tawtoun yevagam, nag. Avei-tut inan bikop, Yowbad Kululuwan mo binek gwad towen, son bises bisigeg.
“Mtowen bo bileb min-Yisleil mwasanin mo bikanavin ninous, beiyum binekes siGuyaw Yowbad.
“Peinan bo bikanow daGuyaws aygan, biwotet Kululuwan tawtoun waseg, ma̱wan Ilaytiy kululuwan. Bivag timsiyas ninous bikanavin mo binekes gamagal; o tasiyas takapidabs bikanavin ninous mo bisinaps ma̱wana tadidumwals. E, natum inawotet ma̱wan, va̱gan bikabutus inagamag silma̱nin Yowbad inawotet.”
Iw to Sekaliy idibek anelos, ilana, “Ama̱wan bakakin amlivan towen mounide? Peinan bo atovek, o gunakwav bo ivnavek.”
Anelos ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Yey Gebliyel, tut babaw natitamanaw wamatan Yowbad. Bo ikayabeig nam adibakeim bulagan towen bwanabwein.
“Peinan nag kusimounid waseg agulivan, bo bukusesuna mamagina gumugum yak. Bukusesuna ee... anatut youd towen nalivnek; wankuyeim mo bukulivan.”
Gamag tasiyas ikayamats Sekaliy, idokes aveiyag wawun inayouviy wanuwan bunatum.
Ikayamats ee... mo isap. Ta-ma̱wan bilivan; mo ikakins mtowen nikin kweitan youd wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum; anilivan bogo naman-wan; wadon nag ma̱wan bilivan.
Mtowen Sekaliy ises iwwotet ee... yam towen iyakous nawotet, mo iyum in wanven.
Wankuyeim nakwav Elisabet mo isum, nises wabunatum kweinim tibukon; mamagina bo issowm wabunatum, ilana, “Yowbad inawotet ma̱wan. Bo ikalin nuwan yey. Gamag nivtokeigs livan vinakal yey, agumwasin; nagein gog bo iyakous.”
<range>
Kweinim tibukon ikous, iton kweivaw, mo Yowbad ikayeb anelos Gebliyel in Galiliy, ven yagan Nasalet. Inek nakubukwab nagtabod nibokes beivay kid son taw Yosep, Deibid delen. Nakubukwab mana̱wen yagan Meliy.
<range>
Mtowen Gebliyel inek Meliy, ilana, “Kalin nuwag! Yowbad soum ya̱koum, ilabeim.”
Mana̱wen anpwa̱yat singay; ininuway seik aveiyag silawun livan towen.
Iw to anelos, ilana, “Meliy, awoum beivag ampwa̱yat. Yowbad bo ikalin nuwan ya̱koum. Igaw mo bukukop natum kuda̱taw. Ikous, mo bukudok yagan Yeisuw.
<range>
“Mtowen bo bitawtoun. Gamag bidokes ‘Tatawtoun Yowbad Natun.’ DaGuyaws Yowbad bo bisek inakaleiwag tawtoun, peinan tabun Deibid inakaleiwag; mo bikaleiwag Yekob delen wasigeis. Nakaleiwag bises bisigeg.”
<range>
Meliy ikatigan anelos, ilana, “Ama̱wan ba̱sum, peinan ta-ivag gunamwan.”
Iw to anelos, idibek, ilana, “Yowbad Kululuwan biwekeim, Yowbad natawtoun waseg bisekeim. Mapuna bukusum natum, gamag bidokes gwad to takamnat, Yowbad Natun tatonen.
“Tage veiyoum Elisabet bo ivnavek mo isum, natun kuda̱taw nises wanuwan. Idokes kid vinakal mana̱wen, tage neisum kweinim tibukon katanok waseg.
“Peinan Yowbad waseg, youd babaw bo kadilok.”
Meliy iligen ikous, mo itam, ilana, “Bwein. Yey Yowbad natouwat yey. Bweina biva̱geig ma̱wan nukulivan.” Anelos towen mo ilisow, inoun.
Tut towen Meliy mo itamanaw, inuwanaw, inoun in koyakoy, ven kweitan wawnuwan Yudiy, isiw in wanuwan Sekaliy nabunatum, imulouls son Elisabet.
<range>
Elisabet iligen Meliy anilivan ikous, natun mo ivatay wanuwan, Yowbad Kululuwan mo inek mana̱wen Elisabet, aygan avakaein, ilana, “Singaya namwa̱saw ya̱koum. Vinay babaw isimwa̱saw nag ma̱wan ya̱koum. Natum nukusum singay bwanabwein.
<range>
“Aveiyag wawun Yowbad nisiwyoubug mo kumekeig, daGuyaws inan ya̱koum?
“Nukum, aligen aygam mo natug ivatay wanuwag, peinan bo imwa̱saw.
“Singay tammwa̱saw ya̱koum peinan kunamis va̱gan bikamat youd towen Yowbad nidibakeim.”
Iw to Meliy, ilana, “Kululuwag iya̱kawn waseg Yowbad.
“Singay amwa̱saw, peinan takatinaweig Yowbad.
“Peinan bo inuway tasimav natouwat yey. Wankuyeim gamag babaw mo bidokeigs nammwa̱saw yey, bweilim katanok katanok waseg.
“Towen Tatawtoun, singaya bo ilabeig; yagan tonen kamnat.
“Bo inok nuwan tasiyas nigigoulus; wankuyeim nitsiyas o tibsiyas bo ma̱wan.
“Naman tawtoun waseg bo itakayway. Bo ikatigulekwes tasiyas takaypamweins sinap.
“Bo ikatigulekwes sikaleiwag tasiyas tatawtouns; o tasiyas tasimavs bo iyamwenes.
“Tasiyas asimoun bo isekes kaeis bwanabwein, beikams bikamuweips. Tage bo ikayabes guyawaw, asimoun waseg iyums.
“Bo inuway anilivan bwein nidibakes tammwayas, tasiyas Ebelam siney delen ya̱kids, tut nag beiyakous. E, bo inuway anilivan, inok nuwan, ilabeids min-Yisleil ya̱kids.”
<range>
Meliy ilivan ikous; asteiy nisesus son Elisabet; adok kweitoun tibukon, mo iyum in wanven.
Mana̱wen Elisabet nises ee... tutan bo itup mo itapoy naman, natun kuda̱taw.
Ansinva̱lam sisiyas taliven mo iliganes bulagan Yowbad nasiwa̱youb avakaein waseg Elisabet, inekes, sisiy imwa̱saws.
Yam kweinim ikous, kwatounun yam mo inekes va̱gan bibwabwes momwan gwad; bidokes kid yagan Sekaliy, mamagina valeyin taman; tage inan igidem sikaleiwag, ilana, “Nag. Tadokes yagan Yon.”
<range>
Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun? Nag ivag amigamag teitan yagan Yon, bukudokes valeyin.”
Mo iliva̱tes nimes waseg, ikatiga̱nes taman, avei-yeg waseg bidokes yagan gwad towen.
Taman towen sivinan buk; isekes mo ilel mamagina “Yagan Yon.” Ikines, bo isom ninous.
Ilelel ikous, mo ikapwageg wadon, ilivan, iya̱kawn waseg Yowbad.
Bo iyow nuwes tasiyas; bulagan illivans ven babaw koyakoy wawnuwan Yudiy.
Asibabaw iliganes, ininuways, ilansa, “Gwad towen aveiyag mo bimlavag?” Peinan Yowbad son gwad towen, ilileb.
Yowbad Kululuwan mo inek taman Sekaliy, ilivnek sinap, ilana:
“Min-Yisleil ya̱kids bitaya̱kawns waseg daGuyaws Yowbad, peinan bo ilakwaneids nagamag ya̱kids, ikatinabweids.
“Natouwat Deibid delen teitan bo isekeids takatinabweids.
“Kweiboug Yowbad nilivnek waseg asilivan inapalopits tatonen.
“Anilivan mamagina bikatinabweids; awoum tasiyas nikamliweids biyagageids.
“O binok nuwan, peinan nilivnek wasigeis tammwayas. Bo inuw anilivan towen mounid.
“Anilivan mounid towen nisek tabuds Ebelam, itam va̱gan bikatinabweids. Awoum tasiyas nikamliweids biyagageids; mapuna beiyakous adpwa̱yats, o bitakanawes aygan, waseg adsinaps didumwal, bwanabwein, yam katanok katanok.
<range>
<range>
“O gwad ya̱koum, igaw gamag mo bidokeims ‘Yowbad Tatawtoun inapalopit ya̱koum.’ Peinan bukumgwey; inaked bukuvag beibwein.
“Bukwatimlakes inagamag mo bikakins nakatuneib waseg, peinan biwid asisinap kalbaleb, binumlev.
“Towen Yowbad inasiwa̱youb bwanabwein beinoy walba̱lab bimekeids, mamagina lalayis beim mititeilin waseg bimteilids, o bimteilis kid tasiyas tadadubs, tasiyens kabkanig walasin, mo bikatimlakeids niwal kidenen.”
<range>
Gwad towen bo itawbwat, bo ivakaein, kululuwan bo itawtoun, misik wanawoud ee... anatut waseg mo ikamat wasigeis min-Yisleil.
Gwad towen Yon igaw kakit, king avakaein yagan Sisal Ogoustos mo ikaleiwag ma̱wana gabman, va̱gan bileles yiges gamag babaw, ven meiveka wasigeis.
Inakaleiwag towen wanamug, anatut mtowen Kwilinis nikaluweg ven yagan Siliy.
Sisal ikaleiwag ikous; mo inounas gamags meivek-wan, ineis wasiven tatineis, silma̱nin yiges bileles.
Yosep-vak ilisow ven Nasalet wawnuwan Galiliy, ikatulags ineis Yudiy, Deibid inaven yagan Betelem, peinan Deibid delen mtowen; e, bilel kid yiges son nakwav Meliy, ankuda̱pom.
<range>
Asteiy nisesus Betelem, mo ilouvat anatut bo nitup.
Nitup mana̱wen, peinan anigavaw, mo ikop natun kuda̱taw. Isumweil anakweim, isen wada̱wag, bulumakaw astavalel waseg, peinan nag ivag a̱ban wanuwan bunatum. Singay gamag babaw.
Ven towen tamtakavateins aleis sip wanawoud boug waseg nimtakavates aleis.
Yowbad nataka̱yob mo isap wasigeis, Yowbad inakamnat imteil ven towen nisikes; mapuna ivag aspwa̱yat.
Anelos towen idibakes, ilana, “Awoum beivag amipwa̱yat, peinan basekeimiy mwa̱saw liva̱nen, simiyas meiveka gamag.
“Nagein gog, Deibid inaven waseg na̱tan vin bo ikop mtowen takatinabweimiy, daGuyaws Kelis.
“Igaw bukuba̱nes a̱pwaw nisumweilis anakweim nimmasis wada̱wag, bukukines mo bukukwakins mtowen Kelis.”
Ilivan ikous, nuwanaw mo inekes min-liba̱lab singay babaw, ikavasis Yowbad, ilansa,
“Singay tayakawanes Yowbad walba̱lab; O niwal watinow wasigeis tasiyas tasiwa̱youbs.”
Anelos tasiyas mo ilisawes, iyum ineis walba̱lab, tamtakavateins aleis mo illivans sisiyas, ilansa, “Kumeis, taneis Betelem, bitakines youd towen nikamat, peinan daGuyaws bo ikamtilakeids.”
Iliva̱nes ikous, nuwanaw ineis, iba̱nes Meliy son Yosep, sisiy a̱pwaw nimmasis wada̱wag.
Ikines ikous, mo ikamteles liva̱nen gwad towen, peinan gum-liba̱lab nikamtilakes.
Tasiyas tamtakavateins aleis ikamteles asilivan ikous, o tasiyas niliganes bo isom ninous.
Tage Meliy isesuna, ininuway youd tasiyas waseg.
Tasiyas tamtakavateins aleis mo iyums, iya̱kawns waseg Yowbad, peinan ma̱wan gum-liba̱lab anilivan, youd babaw ikines o iliganes ma̱wan.
Yam kweinim kweitoun ikous, mo ibwabwes momwan gwad towen, idokes yagan Yeisuw; peinan gum-liba̱lab bo idok yagan kweiboug, inan nag isum; igaw-wan.
Wankuyeim anatut bivka̱yes bikamnat ma̱wan Moses nakaleiwag, mo ikopwes gwad towen, ikatulags ineis Yelusalem, inawes Yowbad waseg.
Peinan Yowbad inakaleiwag waseg anilivan nileles mamagina, “Igaw vin bikop natun kuda̱taw anigavaw waseg, mo bakayus, kudokes ‘Yowbad angamag towen.’”
Mapuna ineis Yelusalem va̱gan beiweiys man mwasanin, bigabus silma̱nin Yowbad, peinan inakaleiwag waseg ilana, “Kuweiys kulitapip mwanay, o kukin nag, mo bwabun mungogewns mwanay.”
Ven Yelusalem taw teitan yagan Simiyon, tadidumwal, ansinap bwein. Ikkayamat anatut Yowbad bisiwyoubus tasiyas min-Yisleil va̱gan beitay nuwes. Yowbad Kululuwan waseg taw towen, bo ikatimlakay mo ikakin bisesuna ee... bikin daGuyaws inaMesay Kelis, mo bikanig wankuyeim.
<range>
Yowbad Kululuwan imgwey taw towen mo inoun in Yowbad wanbunatum. Taman son inan bo ikopwes nitus mtowen Yeisuw, isiws wanuwan bunatum va̱gan biva̱ges peinan, ma̱wan sikikun kweiboug Yowbad inakaleiwag nilel Bukitab waseg.
Mtowen Simiyon im inekes, ikin gwad towen, inup, iya̱kawn waseg Yowbad, ilana:
“MaGuyaw yak, o yey mutouwat, Tut towen amwa̱saw. Kukilaveig bakanig niwal waseg, Ma̱wan nukulivan.
“Peinan wamatag bo akin mtowen takatinabweids.
“Inawotet nukwaluweg wamtes gamag babaw, va̱gan bimteilis tasiyas igaw dadub, tobwag ven wasigeis, mo bikakins tasiyas, bikamnats. Inawotet-vak silma̱nin yakawanan mubod yakamey min-Yisleil.”
<range>
Taman son inan iliganes liva̱nen nitus, isom ninous silma̱nin.
Simiyon mo isekes anilivan bwanabwein, idibek gwad inan, ilana, “Peinan gwad towen inawotet igaw bikow, mo min-Yisleil mwasanin bikalivatows o mwasanin bitamanaws. O mwasanin bikines nawotet ma̱wana naman mulin Yowbad, tage bitawyages.
“Ya̱koum-vak, woum bimouvit, singay bigeg nanoum. Tage mtowen inawotet va̱gan bitakakins ninous babaw gamag.”
Palopit na̱tan yagan An, taman Panuwel, anakum Asel. Bo ivnaveka singay. Igaw naptabod isesuna ee... mo ivays son namwan. Asibweilim nisikes son namwan kweinim kweiy. Namwan mo ikanig. E, isesuna nakwab ee... mo ivag anbweilim sinwanim sinwatoun kweivas. Nag ilisow Yowbad nabunatum, ikikulul wamatan Yowbad yam o boug, ipsapos o ininitoug.
<range>
Anatut tasiyas sisiy nitus nimeis, mo isap mana̱wen vin, ikalin nuwan waseg Yowbad, o idibakes tasiyas min-Yelusalem, ilana, “Gwad towen inawotet va̱gan bikatinabweids”; peinan tasiyas nikaymates teitan gamag beim silma̱nin nawotet towen.
Tasiyas son nakwav iyakousis youd babaw silma̱nin Yowbad nakaleiwag, mo iyums ineis Galiliy wasiven Nasalet.
Yowbad ikalin nuwan waseg gwad towen; bo itub, ivakaein bo itawtoun, bo ivag nanon; bo ivag ansinap avakaein.
Taman o inan, asigulagul bweilim kanatok kanatok inineis Yelusalem silma̱nin Kaltuwon Sigeilin.
Yeisuw anbweilim sinwatan kweiy, ikatulags ineis Yelusalem, ma̱wan asigulagul kweiboug.
Sagal towen iyakousis, iyums ineis wa̱ked, tage nitus nises Yelusalem. Taman inan nag ikakins, idokes kid sisiy, peinan babaw gamag. Inounas ee... iboug, mo inineivs tawlisiyas o sisiyas wasigeis.
<range>
Ininineivs bo nag, mo iyumnavaws ineis Yelusalem, ininevs nitus.
Ininineivs yam kweitoun, mo iba̱nes Yowbad wanbunatum, nisesus ikkaypuls siney tasiyas takatimlakays, iligen asilivan o ikatitugan wasigeis.
Babaw gamag niliganes ansinap waseg ikatimop asilivan, isom ninous, peinan ansinap singay-wan.
Taman inan ikines, bo isom ninous; inan mo idibek, ilana, “Natug yak, aveiyag wawun nukuva̱gem ma̱wan? Soug tamam nakanineveim, ikubukub nuwem seikwan.”
Iwa̱ge, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun kunineveigs? Tabta kukwakins yey nases tamag wanbunatum?”
Tage tasiyas nag ikakins livan towen nidibakes.
Siney tasiyas mo iwloubus ineis Nasalet, mtowen bo ikanaway ages; tage inan ininuway youd tasiyas silma̱nin.
Yeisuw bo itub ivakaein, bo isinap. Yowbad ikalin nuwan, o gamag ikalin nuwes waseg.
Astakaleiwag avakaein Sisal Tibeliyas; inakaleiwag anbweilim sinwatan kweivas bweilim bo nein wankuyeim. Ponitiy Paylat takaleiwag ven Yudiy waseg; Elod takaleiwag Galiliy waseg, o bwadan Pilip takaleiwag waseg ven Ituliy son ven Tila̱konit; o Lisaniyas takaleiwag ven Abilen waseg.
Tanuwgwes lun sitovek avakaein Anas son Kayapas. Sekaliy natun Yon wanawoud misik, Yowbad anilivan inek Yon mo ikakin.
Yowbad anilivan mo ikow, inow ven towen walasin yevagam Yoldan; iguyes gamag va̱gan bilavewas asisinap kalbaleb, bibapta̱yses, Yowbad mo biwid asisinap beikous.
Liva̱nen Yon nises Bukitab, anilivan palopit mtowen Isaya, mamagina: “Aygan mtowen tawkuwak wanawoud mamagina: ‘Kwaleliws daGuyaws inaked, bididumwal. Kadiloka bitadibwanis leg babaw, o bitagiyeilis koy bimamanas. Aveiyag kaydodog mo bitadumwa̱lus, o ked kalbaleb bitagiyeilis bimamanas. Meiveka gamag mo bikines ama̱wan Yowbad bikatinabweids.’”
<range>
<range>
Singay babaw gamag inekes Yon va̱gan bibapta̱yses tasiyas, mo ilivan, ilana, “Ma̱wana mwatet yakamiy! Adok teitan nidibakeimiy peinan Yowbad anvikun, bimop kid amisinap kalbaleb, mapuna kusawls kumekeigs.
“Kadiloka bikanavin ninoumiy va̱gan beibwein miwotet. Awoum kuninuways tibumiy Ebelam. Yowbad nag bikalin nuwan peinan tibumiy Ebelam. Deisa beibwein miwotet, mo bikalin nuwan wasigeis yakamiy. Yowbad kadiloka dakul tasiyas bivag mo bimlavags Ebelam tibun.
“Tage tut towen Yowbad ikow ta̱lal bitateiy kasiyas amweilok kalba̱lebs, bikalivatows. Kukin nag beivag anagin bwein, mo bitateiy, bikatikunok, bikow, binow, bilev, bein wa̱kov, bigob.”
Gamag babaw mo ikatugans, ilansa, “Aveiyag bakavag yakamey?”
Ikatimop, ilana, “Kukin kal anakweim mwayney, kadiloka mwaynatan bisek son, kavel anakweim nag ivag. Kukin sam kan, kadilok-vak bisek son, kavel nag ivag kan.”
Takaweins ta̱kis mwasanin sivines-vak bibaptays, inekes, ikatugans waseg Yon, ilansa, “Takatimlakay yak aveiyag bakavag yakamey?”
Iwa̱ge, ilana, “Ma̱wan mitovek nakaleiwag kukwawes ta̱kis; meiyum bo deis. Awoum kuva̱ges bivakaein.”
Takaninaviys-vak ikatiga̱nes, ilansa, “Yakamey, aveiyag bakavag?” Iwa̱ge, ilana, “Awoum kutawtouns wasigeis gamag kukwayes siwliyoug. Awoum kuyaweids ya̱tal waseg kukwawes gamag siwliyoug. Maysamiy nises, kadiloka bibabeit mitamiy. Awoum kumtapwags.”
Gamag babaw idokes Kelis beim watinow, mo Yon nawotet ikines, idokes kal, takinew Kelis, adok tobwag.
Yon ikakina ninous tasiyas, mapuna ikatimop, ilana, “Yey abapta̱yseimiy yevagam waseg; tage teitan beim; natawtoun waseg ilaveig yey. Yey tasimav, nag kadilok basin bastotow bakablev nasandol. Mtowen beim mo bibapta̱yseimiy waseg Kululuwan Bwanabwein, mamagina kov.
“Nakaytuk wanaman va̱gan biwaway anawit biyakous, mo bikow anagin binow wanseigous, tage musamusan wit bilev bein wa̱kov bigbugwab yam babaw; nag biyakous.”
Anilivan wa̱seg singay babaw mo igiguyes o ikatimlakes gamag, va̱gan livan bwanabwein biliganes.
Tage bo idibek gabman towen Elod, ilana, “Amsinap kalbaleb peinan bo kukow bwadam nakwav Elodiyas, o peinan muwotet kweitan kweitan kalbaleb.” Elod mo ivag kweitan-vak ansinap kalbaleb, mo iyous Yon, isen wa̱deil.
<range>
Yon nibapta̱yses gamag babaw ikous, o nibaptays Yeisuw ikous, misumkwey towen Yeisuw bo ikulul, initoug waseg Yowbad, liba̱lab mo itavis, Kululuwan Bwanabwein ibus im, iton wakunuwatan. Kululuwan won tatonen ankakin ma̱wana bwabun, mo aygan teitan walba̱lab iliganes, ilana, “Yak Natug bwanabwein yak, singaya ibwein nanoug waseg ya̱koum.”
<range>
Yeisuw, anatut nisilamaw nawotet anbweilim adok sinwatoun. Gamag idokes taman Yosep. Yosep taman Ilay.
Ilay taman Madatat. Madatat taman Livay. Livay taman Melik. Melik taman Danay. Danay taman Yosep.
Yosep taman Mataday. Mataday taman Emos. Emos taman Nekum. Nekum taman Esliy. Esliy taman Nagay.
Nagay taman Makat. Makat taman Mataday. Mataday taman Semein. Semein taman Yosek. Yosek taman Yod.
Yod taman Yowanan. Yowanan taman Lis. Lis taman Delububel. Delububel taman Seyaltiyel. Seyaltiyel taman Neliy.
Neliy taman Melik. Melik taman Adiy. Adiy taman Kosan. Kosan taman Elmadam. Elmadam taman El.
El taman Yosuw. Yosuw taman Eliyesel. Eliyesel taman Dolim. Dolim taman Madatat. Madatat taman Livay.
Livay taman Simiyon. Simiyon taman Yud. Yud taman Yosep. Yosep taman Yonam. Yonam taman Iliyakim.
Iliyakim taman Malay. Malay taman Men. Men taman Matat. Matat taman Nadan. Nadan taman Deibid.
Deibid taman Desiy. Desiy taman Obed. Obed taman Bowas. Bowas taman Sal. Sal taman Nason.
Nason taman Amminadab. Amminadab taman Edmin. Edmin taman Anay. Anay taman Eslon. Eslon taman Peles. Peles taman Yud.
Yud taman Yekob. Yekob taman Aysak. Aysak taman Ebelam. Ebelam taman Telak. Telak taman Neyol.
Neyol taman Selug. Selug taman Lew. Lew taman Peleg. Peleg taman Ebel. Ebel taman Selak.
Selak taman Keinan. Keinan taman Alpaksad. Alpaksad taman Sem. Sem taman Now. Now taman Lemek.
Lemek taman Metuselak. Metuselak taman Inok. Inok taman Deled. Deled taman Ma̱lalel. Ma̱lalel taman Keinan.
Keinan taman Inos. Inos taman Set. Set taman Adam. Adam taman Yowbad.
Yowbad Kululuwan Bwanabwein bo itawtoun waseg Yeisuw, ilisow Yoldan iyum in wanawoud. Yowbad Kululuwan imgwey Yeisuw inoun yam sinwavas, waseg Seitan iyyakwen. Yam tasiyas nag ikamkwam ee... nakabiyokous waseg mo ivag anamoun.
<range>
Yeisuw anamoun, Seitan mo idibek, ilana, “Magat Yowbad Natun yak, kadiloka kudibek dakul towen, mo bimlavag kam.”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Liva̱nen nises Bukitab waseg mamagina: ‘Makava kan nag biyamov gamag.’”
Wankuyeim Seitan mo itok inow wanakaew, ikatimlek ven babaw wadaban pwepway. Sivtanok ikin ikous; mo Seitan ilivan, ilana, “Ven tasiyas son yakawanan basekeim mukwaleiwag, peinan gunakaleiwag towen. Am-towen sivinag mo basek. Magat yak bukukulul wamatag, mo basekeim silma̱nin mukwaleiwag.”
<range>
<range>
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Liva̱nen nises Bukitab waseg mamagina: ‘Kadiloka bukukulul wamatan Guyaw Yowbad. Mtowen anmwa̱net bukwanow aygan.’”
Mo itok Yeisuw inow Yelusalem, isen Yowbad nabunatum wankunumwan, idibek, ilana, “Magat Yowbad Natun yak, kwaspepel kun watinow. Liva̱neim nises Bukitab waseg, ‘Bo bisek nataka̱yobs siwotet mo bimtakavateims.’
<range>
“Kweitan livan nises mamagina: ‘Nimes waseg binupeims; Mata ge kakeim beiweiy dakul.’”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Livan nises mamagina: ‘Awoum kuyakwen muGuyaw Yowbad.’”
Seitan iyakous ansinap babaw waseg iyakwen Yeisuw, mo ilisow, in, ikayamat kweitan tut, idok beiyum binek.
Yowbad Kululuwan natawtoun waseg Yeisuw, mo iyum in Galiliy; bulagan in ven babaw Galiliy walasin.
Ven babaw sisinagog katanok katanok waseg ikkatimlakay, mapuna gamag babaw ikavasis mtowen Yeisuw.
Ikous, mo in Nasalet, ven towen nituyay-yay waseg; isiw in wasinagog, ma̱wan ankikun, peinan Sa̱bat. Mo itamanaw va̱gan bivin Bukitab.
Itamanaw, mo isekes buk bivin. Buk towen palopit Isaya inabuk. Ikaliyow buk towen iban mwaynatan yageivein waseg nilel mamagina:
“Yowbad Kululuwan waseg yey. Bo isekeig gunawotet va̱gan bageiguy livan bwein, basekes tasiyas tasimavs. Bo ikayabeig nam badibakes tasiyas wa̱deil mo bisaps bineis wamnat. O tasiyas toukwaws mo bikines. O tasiyas, abes igeg, batokes banawes bwanabwein keb waseg. O baliwon baka̱mat Yowbad anbweilim waseg igaw mo bilabeimiy.”
<range>
Ivin ikous, ikatibog buk towen, isek tanuwagan, mo isin. Tasiyas nisesus wasinagog mites meivek-wan igintoves Yeisuw.
Isin towen, mo idibakes, ilana, “Kweiboug Bukitab nilivnek youd towen, tage nagein bo ikamat; yakamiy nukuliganes.”
Asibabaw asilivan idokes Yeisuw ansinap bwein. Ikatiliganes anilivan peinan singay bwein, mo isom ninous, ikatugans; ilansa, “Tabta mtowen Yosep natun, ne? Ama̱wan bikakin sinap towen?”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Mounid bukudibakeigs adilivans mamagin: ‘Doket ya̱koum, kuva̱geim tatoneim mo bukubwein!’ Adok bukulana, ‘Bulagam Kapaneyum waseg nakaligen, kuvag ma̱wan, wamven tatoneim.’”
Yeisuw mo ilivan, ilana, “Mounid adibakeimiy, gamag nag biliganes palopit anilivan wanven tatonen.”
Yeisuw ilivan-vak, ilana, “Anatut Ilaytiy nag ikweis kweis kweitoun bweilim mo tibukon kweinim katanok, o nakwabs singay babaw ven towen Yisleil waseg, tage Yowbad nag ikayeb Ilaytiy binek nakwab vinen-Yisleil va̱gan bimtakavet kan Ilaytiy, nag. Ikayeb Ilaytiy inek vinen-Sidon, nakwab na̱tan inaven Salepat.
<range>
“Toulepel-vak singay babaw ven Yisleil waseg, tage palopit Ilays nag ivag ibweins; misinaka ivag ibwein gum-Siliy teitan yagan Na̱man.”
Tasiyas wanuwan sinagog iliganes Yeisuw anilivan towen, mo ikapasal nuwes, ituts, iyousis Yeisuw, inawes watoulan ven, itokes inawes dibwadeb tigtageg waseg, ven nikabis wakunuwatan, idokes bilaves bein watinow.
<range>
Tage Yeisuw ilavay wanuwana gamag babaw, inoun in, ilisawes.
Iwloubus in Galiliy ven yagan Kapaneyum. Sa̱bat waseg ikatimlakes gamag, mo isom ninous, peinan inakatimlakay tawtoun, ma̱wana takaleiwag tatonen.
<range>
Wasinagog towen gamag teitan, yeiluw kalbaleb nises wa̱won. Aygan avakaein iwak, ilana, “Ya! Aveiyag bukunuwakeig ya̱koum gum-Nasalet Yeisuw? Adok bukuyagageig, ne? Akakina yak, Yowbad Natun yak.”
<range>
Tage Yeisuw ikan yeiluw towen, ilana, “Kukwa̱pay, kukilev taw towen.” Yeiluw ivag taw towen ikalouw imasis wapwepway wanuwes gamags, ikilev taw towen, inoun; tage taw towen bo ibwein, nag iyageg, nag.
Bo isom ninous tasiyas, illivans sisiyas, ilansa, “Aw-sinap towen? Inakaleiwag tawtoun idibakes tasiyas yeiluw kalbaleb mo ikilaves gamags.”
Bulagan in ven babaw Kapaneyum walasin.
Yeisuw itamanaw ilisow sinagog, inoun in Saymon wanbunatum. Saymon yawan nimmasis ankatoun, won mana̱wen vin singay muyamuy, initougs waseg Yeisuw va̱gan bileb.
Iligen, inoun in, itamanaw itoun walasin, ikayeb katoun towen, mo iyenom. Bo ibwein, nuwanaw mo itamanaw ivag kaeis mo ikams.
Wankuyeim ka̱las iseilil, mo imeyes takatouns waseg Yeisuw, askatoun kweitan kweitan; isen naman wawous tatanok tatanok, mo ibweins.
Bwagaw-vak nibugawus gamag mwasanin, Yeisuw ivag mo ilisawes; iwkuwaks, ilansa, “Ya̱koum Yowbad Natun ya̱koum!” Tage Yeisuw ika̱nes; nag itam va̱gan bilivans, peinan iwtusis, ikakins mtowen Kelis, takatinabwein gamags.
Iyam ga̱boug mo inoun in ven makaw. Gamag babaw mo ineis ineves; iba̱nes mo inekes. Bikayuses kid Yeisuw; ilansa, “Awoum bukulisawem.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Nag! Kadiloka bageiguy liva̱nen Yowbad nakaleiwag, wasigeis ven kweitan kweitan. Yowbad nikayabeig nam silma̱nin nawotet towen.”
Mo ita̱vin in igeiguy sinagog kweitan kweitan Yudiy waseg.
Iggeiguy Yowbad anilivan ee... siva̱tan tut itamanaw wadadan yevagan nikatiboul yagan Genesalet. Singay babaw gamag katuyouns inekes, ipapeps wawous va̱gan biliganes anilivan.
Itabinis Yeisuw, mo ikin wag akiy nibiteilis wakawalaw; o tasiyas taplapouls bo ikawes siwoyim, inawes ilasa̱pis.
Itabinis Yeisuw, mo itouw kaytan wag, Saymon inawag, idibek Saymon, ilana, “Kwalises tasineikik-nen mo bageiguy.” E, ikayseles wag, isineikiks-nen, Yeisuw isin wa̱wag, itouvin mo ikatimlakes tasiyas wanakaew nisesus.
Illivan ikous, mo idibek Saymon ilana, “Tata̱bus taneis wabwanit, mo kupouls.”
Iw to Saymon, ilana, “Tamwey, nakaplapoul ee... iyam, bo nag. Tage peinan amlivan waseg mo ba̱poul vayuwein.”
Misinaka sawtanoka ilaves, mo ikwanes in singay babaw. Kakita bikalitounis woyim. Mapuna iloukwams, idibakes sisiyas, ilansa, “Wag kwayuwein kumeyes.” Imeyes kwayuwein wag, ilabes; idagis in, bo ika̱lawt wag akiy. Kakita bimukuls wag.
<range>
Saymon Pita ikin in singay babaw; iwen Yeisuw, itapop, ikulul waskawan kaken, mo initoug, ilana, “O Guyaw, kunoun kun, kulisaweig, peinan takalbaleb yey.”
Pita anilivan ma̱wan, peinan iyow nuwes siney tasiyas; ikines asiyin singay babaw.
Tasiyas-vak Sebediy nitun iyow nuwes. Yiges tasiyas Yemes, Yon. Sisiy Saymon taplapouls tasiyas. Yeisuw mo idibek Saymon, ilana, “Awoum beivag ampwa̱yat. Igaw bukwatikunakus gamags, ma̱wana wot waseg nukukwanes in.”
Ibiteilis siwag ikous, mo ilisawes siwliyoug wa̱wag nises, ikikuns Yeisuw waseg.
Wankuyeim misik kweitan ven toulepel teitan mo inek, meivek kaleivin kakulikul. Im towen, ikin Yeisuw, ikalivatow kantukov wamatan, initoug waseg, ilana, “Guyaw, magat sivinam, bukuvag kaleivig beibwein.”
Yeisuw iligen, iyasel naman, ikabkwen won, ilana, “Bo bavag kaleivim beibwein.” Nuwanaw mo ibwein toulepel towen.
Yeisuw anilivan tawtoun mo ilivan, ilana, “Awoum kudibek teitan gamag; awoum. Tage kunoun kunek tanuwagan lun bikineim, mo kukow aleim mansiyas Moses nilivan, kusek Yowbad peinan bo kubwein, o gamag bikineims o bisimounids bo kubwein.”
Ilivan; bo nag. Peinan bulagan bo in babaw gamag wasigeis; mo gamag singay babaw katuyouns kid biliganes aygan o bivag askatoun kweitan kweitan mo beibweins.
Yeisuw gog ininoun-wan wanawoud, ininitoug waseg Yowbad.
Yam kweitan waseg ikatimlakay, o tasitas Palisiy mwasanin sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag mwasanin isinis wadadan. Tasiyas meinoy nimeis ven babaw Galiliy waseg o Yudiy waseg o Yelusalem waseg nimekes Yeisuw; o Yowbad natawtoun waseg Yeisuw, biva̱ges takatouns mo ibweins.
Wankuyeim tawaw mwasanin bimeyes takatoun teitan nimmasis wa̱keb siwsawoul won. Sivines bimeyes wamatan Yeisuw bikin.
Iyokons, nag. Ta-ma̱wan. Gamag singay babaw. Mo imwens watapwan bunatum, ikiboulis tapwan, ikaygwagwes takatoun wakaban nimmasis, mo ibus in, iton Yeisuw wamatan o wanuwes gamag babaw.
Yeisuw ikin, ikakina singay inmises, o idokes bo bileb takatoun towen, mapuna ilivan, ilana, “Ya̱koum amsinap kalbaleb bo awid; bo ikous.”
Tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag sisiyas Palisiy bo isunasun ninous, ilansa, “Kal mtowen ilivan makaw, kalbaleb? Anmwa̱net Yowbad kadilok biwid sinap kalbaleb beikous.”
Yeisuw ikakin ninous, ikatimop asilivan, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun isunasun ninoumiy? Bweina balivan balana, ‘Bawid amsinap kalbaleb; beikous’? O bweina balivan-vak balana, ‘Kutamanaw kunoun’? Wotet akweiy gagab waseg yey.
<range>
“Kadiloka kukwakins Gimgilitoun yey, o gunakaleiwag nises ven watinow va̱gan bawid gamag asisinap kalbaleb.” Mo idibek towen takatoun, ilana, “Adibakeim yak, kutamanaw, kukow a̱bam, kun wambunatum.”
Nuwanaw mo itamanaw wamtes, ikow keb to nimsik, inoun, inow wanven; singaya iya̱kawn waseg Yowbad.
Asibabawa ikines, bo isom ninous, iyakawanes Yowbad, igoulus, ilansa, “Nageina mo nitakines sinap kweitan.”
Wankuyeim Yeisuw isap, ikin takawein ta̱kis teitan, yagan Livay, nissin buntuman ta̱kis waseg, mo idibek, ilana, “Kubkunig.”
Mtowen iligen, itamanaw, ilisow navavag babaw, inoun, ibukun Yeisuw.
Ibukun, mo ivag kan wanbunatum silma̱nin Yeisuw beikam. O nimeis tasiyas takaweins ta̱kis babaw, sisiyas gamag singay babaw, ikamkwams sisiy Yeisuw.
Tasiyas Palisiy sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag ikines, ivtokays livan, idibakes inavamul, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun kukwams o kumoums simwayas tasiyas takaweins ta̱kis o tasiyas takalbalebs?”
Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Tasiyas toubweins nag sivines doket; misinaka takatouns. Nag am silma̱nin tasiyas toubweins, tage silma̱nin tasiyas asisinap kalbaleb, badawes va̱gan bikanavin ninous mo beibweins.”
<range>
Wankuyeim idibakes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Yon inavamul singaya kutukut ipsapos o ininitougs waseg Yowbad, o tasiyas-vak Palisiy sivamul ipsapos o ininitougs; tage ya̱koum muvamul ikamkwams, imwamoums.”
Iw to Yeisuw, idibakes, ilana, “Sigeilin veivay waseg, ta-ma̱wan tasiyas tassagals beipos, peinan taveivay siney tasiyas nisesus. Tage igaw anatut waseg taveivay bilisawes, mo beipos tut towen waseg.”
<range>
Kabebay kweitan idibakes, ilana, “Nag kal bisiled mwaynavaw kweim bibweil kweim mwaynaboug, peinan kweivaw kweim bo biyageg, o nag bibunek kweiboug kweim waseg.
“Nag kal bivgog kunasoup kunaboug waseg wayn kweivaw, peinan beilol wayn mo bitavis kunasoup biyageg, o bo biyamkwen wayn.
“Tage bivgog kunasoup kunavaw wanuwan, mo bises bwein.
“Nag kal beimoum kweiboug wayn mo sivinan kweivaw. Ilana, ‘Peinan kweiboug bwanabwein.’”
Wankuyeim, Sa̱bat waseg, ikanapels bag kweitan, siney navamul, mo inavamul ilpeleps wit mwanoug, inutus, ikimmayes va̱gan biba̱nes anagin beikams.
Palisiy mwasanin ikines, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun kuva̱ges ma̱wan, kusiplaves Moses nakaleiwag?”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Adok bo kuvinis liva̱nen Deibid, ne? Peinan asimoun siney nagamag, isiw in wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum, ikow bled towen nisenas wamatan Yowbad, nikatibomes silma̱nin tanuwgwes lun beikams, o towen Deibid nag kadilok beikam. Tage peinan asimoun, ikam, mo isekes siney ikams.”
<range>
Mo Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Gimgilitoun yey; takaleiwag Sa̱bat waseg, yey.”
Kwayuwein Sa̱bat isiw in wasinagog ikatimlakay. Taw teitan nises, naka̱tay ipam.
Tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag sisiyas tasiyas Palisiy ikinbunikes, idokes kid bivag taw towen beibwein Sa̱bat waseg; bivag ma̱wan mo biyateles Yeisuw.
Ikakina sikanuway, idibek towen toupam, ilana, “Kum, kutom towen.” Mo mtowen itamanaw im.
Yeisuw mo ikatiga̱nes, ilana, “Kadeg? Tab kadilok Sa̱bat waseg bitawotet bwein? o kalbaleb? Bitayamov gamag? o bitayageg gamag?”
Yeisuw ikines gamag tasiyas babaws ikous, wankuyeim mo idibek mtowen toupam, ilana, “Kudumwes namam.” Idumwes, bo ibwein.
Tasiyas gog, bo ikapasal nuwes peinan iwotet Sa̱bat waseg, illivans sisiyas aveiyag binuwakes.
Misiya̱mun towen inoun in ven koyakoy waseg va̱gan binitoug waseg Yowbad; ininitoug ee... iyam.
Iyam ga̱boug idawes navamul mo imekes. Waseg bod towen ikatigik inagamag, misinaka sinwatan teiy, va̱gan bimlavag aposol bikanawes kid aygan.
Tasiyas yiges mamagina: teitan Saymon, mo idok yagan Pita, o bwadan yagan Andiluw; o Yemes son Yon; o Pilip son Batolimiw; o Matiw son Tomas; o Alpiyow natun yagan Yemes; o talliwon towen yagan Saymon; o Yemes natun Yudas; o tayuwein Yudas Iskaliyot, mtowen bisilkod Yeisuw.
<range>
<range>
Siney tasiyas iwloubus, itamanaws wasapon, sisiyas inavamul singay babaws; sisiyas babaw min-Yudiy o min-Yelusalem o tasiyas misikes ven Ta̱yil o Sidon wakawalaw, asibabaw nimeis kid biliganes aygan, o bivag va̱gan beibwein askatoun.
O Tasiyas bwagaw nibugawus, ivag mo ibweins.
Asibabaw sivines bikabikons wa̱won Yeisuw, silma̱nin natawtoun binekes kid tasiyas, mo beibweins.
Itamnow matan mo ikines navamul ilana: “Tamumwa̱saw yakamiy tasimavs, peinan Yowbad nakaleiwag nises wasigeis yakamiy.
“Tamumwa̱saw yakamiy amimoun, bo bukwamuweips. Tamumwa̱saw yakamiy tavva̱lams, peinan bukugigs.
“Kukin gamag mwasanin bikamliweimiy peinan agugwamag yakamiy, o kukin bipiyaveimiy o bitawyageimiy o bivtokeimiy livan, mamagina takalbaleb yakamiy, kadiloka kumwa̱saws avakaein, kusilasals, peinan maysamiy avakaein nises walba̱lab. Kweiboug timsiyas inuwakes tasiyas palopits ma̱wan.
<range>
“Tage guyawaw yakamiy, kalbaleb bukulivatus, peinan maysamiy nukukwawes ven watinow, bo misinak.
“Bo kukwamuweips yakamiy, tage kalbaleb bukulivatus, moun bikamateimiy. “Kugagigs tut towen, tage kalbaleb bukulivatus, bukuva̱lams.
“Tut towen gamag babaw ikavasimiy, tage kalbaleb bukulivatus. Peinan kweiboug timsiyas bo ikavasis tasiyas palopit tayyaweids. Yakamiy ma̱wana tasiyas.
“Tage adibakeimiy taliganeins agulivan yakamiy: Kadiloka kusiwyoubus tasiyas nikamliweimiy. Kulabes tasiyas nikamliweimiy.
“Kulivans bwein wasigeis tasiyas nikawtuneimiy. Kunitougs waseg Yowbad va̱gan bilabes tasiyas niyageimiy.
“Kukin kal beiweiy silapam kutouvin-vak paliyuwein beiweiy. Kukin kal bikwey amukweim, kusek-vak musag.
“Kukin kal tasimav binitoug waseg yak, kadiloka kusek. Kukin kal bikwey muwliyoug, awoum kulivan biyamen.
“Ama̱wan sivinamiy gamag biva̱ges wasigeis yakamiy, kuva̱ges ma̱wan wasigeis tasiyas.
“Kukin bukusiwyoubus tasiyas nisiwyoubumiy nag ivag amisinap bwein. Takalbalebs-vak iva̱ges ma̱wan.
“Kukin bukulabes tasiyas nilabeimiy nag ivag amisinap bwein. Takalbalebs-vak iva̱ges ma̱wan.
“Kukin bukusekes miwliyoug wasigeis tasiyas kudokes igaw bimapus, nag ivag amisinap bwein. Tasiyas takalbalebs isekes sisiyas va̱gan igaw mo bimapus.
“Tage yakamiy, kadiloka kusiwyoubus tasiyas nikamliweimiy, o kulabes gamag, kusekes miwliyoug. Awoum kunmises mapun bukukwawes. Bukuva̱ges ma̱wan agulivan, mo bukuba̱nes maysamiy avakaein, bukumlavags Yowbad nitun yakamiy. Peinan Yowbad issiwyoubus tasiyas tagidukis sisiyas takalbalebs babaw-wan.
“Yakamiy-vak kadiloka binok nuwamiy wasigeis tasiyas; ma̱wan ansinap Tamads walba̱lab.
“Awoum kudokes gamag mwasanin takalbalebs, ma̱wan Yowbad bidokeimiy takalbalebs yakamiy. Awoum kumapus asisinap; ma̱wan Yowbad bimop amisinap yakamiy. Tage kuwidis, kunumlaves asisinap, mo biwid amisinap yakamiy, binumlev.
“Kusekes tasiyas, mo Yowbad bisekeimiy, miwliyoug bibabaw, bo bika̱lawt wasigeis yakamiy. Ama̱wan vakaeinan bukusekes simiyas, bo ma̱wana vakaeinan Yowbad bisekeimiy yakamiy.”
Kweitan kabebay isekes mamagina: “Kukin toukwaw bimgwey toukwaw teitan, nag kadilok ked biba̱nes. Asteiy bo bikalivatows bineis wa̱leg.”
Kweitan livan isekes mamagina: “Kukin tamwey kal bimulis natouwats, tasiyas navamul nag bikaleiwags; igaw gog biyakousis sitovek ansinap mo bimlavags ma̱wana tamwey towen.
“Aveiyag wawun kukines musamus nises bwadam matan waseg, tage nag kukin amweilok avakaein matam toneim wanuwan?
“Aveiyag wawun kudibek bwadam, kulana, ‘Gwade, bo bakablev musamus wamatam’ tage nag kukin amweilok matam toneim wanuwan? Tayyaweid ya̱koum, wanamug kwablev amweilok matam waseg, mo bukukin bunik musamus bwadam wamatan, bukwablev.
“Nag kadilok amweilok bwanabwein beiwuw gog anagin kalbaleb, nag; o nag kadilok amweilok kalbaleb beiwuw gog bwanabwein, nag.
“Bitakin wuwan mo bitakakin amweilok ama̱wan, bwein o kalbaleb. Adilaboub waseg nag bitalep yaveinun. Amweilok kulikoul waseg nag bitalep gleip, nag.
“Gamag ma̱wan. Magat nanon bwein mo beivag ansinap bwein; tage kukin nanon kalbaleb mo beivag ansinap kalbaleb. Aveiyag gamag nanon bika̱lawt waseg, mo bisap wadon, billivan ma̱wan.
“Aveiyag wawun kudibakeigs kulansa, ‘Guntovek, guntovek,’ tage nag kwanawes aygag?
“Kal yak bukumekeig, bukuligen agulivan o bukwanow aygag, bakabebay va̱gan bukukwakins ama̱wan amsinap.
“Peinan ya̱koum ma̱wana taw teitan niwlul nabunatum, ikaviyeil in watinow va̱gan kakolan bunatum bisin wakunuwatan dakul. Iwlul iyakous mo ikweis avakaein, yevagam ila̱tay avakaein iwaweiy bunatum towen, tage nag igogewn, peinan iwlul bwein.
“Tage kal yak bukuligen agulivan, tage nag bukwanaway aygag, ya̱koum ma̱wana taw teitan niwlul nabunatum, tage kakolan igwey, nikelay pwepway makaw waseg; yevagam mo ila̱tay avakaein, iwaweiy bunatum towen, nuwanaw mo ikalivatow, ikatagulek iyakous. Bo igak.”
Anilivan isekes gamag ikous, mo inoun in Kapaneyum.
Ven towen mina-Lom sitakalikay nises; mtowen singay sivinan natouwat teitan; tage bo ikatoun avakaein mtowen natouwat. Kakita bo bikanig.
Takalikay towen iligen bulagan Yeisuw mo idawes min-Yudiy tammwayas mwasanin, ikayabes bikines Yeisuw, binitougs va̱gan beim bivag takalikay natouwat towen mo beibwein.
Min-Yudiy tasiyas inekes Yeisuw, igilagels, ilansa, “Bweina kuvag, peinan takalikay towen ansinap bwein, sivinan gamag ya̱kids mo iwlul dasinagogs.”
<range>
Yeisuw iligen, siney tasiyas ineis ee... kakita bisaps takalikay nabunatum waseg, takalikay towen mo ikayabes viyen mwasanin, imekes Yeisuw, isekes takalikay anilivan, ilansa, “Takalikay anilivan mamagina: Guyaw, awoum bivakaein muwotet. Yey toul wamatam yak. Awoum bukusiw wagunbunatum. Mapuna na-ikadilokeig bawekeim yak. Deisa kulivan mo beibwein guntouwat. Yey akakin kaleiwag. Gunakaleiwag nises wasigeis guntakanaviys. Badibek teitan, balana, ‘Kun,’ mo bein. Tayuwein badibek balana, ‘Kum,’ mo beim. O guntouwat badibek, balana, ‘Kuwtel wotet,’ mo biwtel. Bweina kulivan beibwein ankatoun.”
<range>
<range>
Yeisuw iligen anilivan towen, bo isom nanon, itouvin, idibakes asibabaw antabwa̱kuns, ilana, “Mounid nag aban gum-Yisleil binamis beibwein waseg yey, tage takalikay towen singay inamis bwein.”
Ikous, takalikay natouwats tasiyas mo iyums ineis wanbunatum, iba̱nes natouwat, bo ibwein.
Yamtan yam mo ineis ven yagan Neyn siney navamul sisiyas gamag babaw.
Inounas ee... kakita bisaps wakalamatan ven, mo ilivatus tasiyas takaweins takanig nimeis, peinan bo bidibwanis. Takanig kuda̱taw, inan nakwab, tage towen natun anmwa̱net. Yeisuw ikin mana̱wen vin ivva̱lam siney ven gimgilis singay babaw. Yeisuw ikin, inok nuwan, idibek, ilana, “Mata kuva̱lam.”
<range>
Mo imek takanig a̱ban, ikabkwen. Takaweins toumat tasiyas mo itomos. Mo idibek takanig, ilana, “Tawlat yak, adibakeim, kukit.”
Mo takanig towen ikit, illivan. Yeisuw itok mo inow inan waseg.
Tasiyas ikines, bo igeg ninous, iyakawanes Yowbad, ilansa, “Palopit avakaein bo isap wasigeis ya̱kids,” o ilansa, “Yowbad bo ilakwaneids inagamag ya̱kids.”
Bulagan towen in ven babaw wawnuwan Yudiy mo ibekena walasin Yudiy.
Tasiyas Yon inavamul ikines, mo inekes Yon wa̱deil nises, ikamteles youd tasiyas.
Yon iligen, idouw navamul asteiy, ikayabes kid binekes Yeisuw bilansa, “Age ya̱koum Mesay? o nag? bakakaymet tayuwein beim?”
Tawaw tasiyas inounas, inekes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Tabibapta̱ysein gamag towen Yon nikayabem nakam, kasekeim anilivan, ilana, ‘Age ya̱koum Mesay? o nag? bakakaymet tayuwein beim?’”
Yam towen waseg, Yeisuw iva̱ges mo ibweins takatouns babaw, sisiyas tasiyas bwagaw nibugawus, o toukwaws babaw iva̱ges mo ikines.
Yeisuw iligen asilivan Yon navamul tasiyas, ilana, “Kuyums, kwamtilakes Yon sinap towen nukukines o nukuliganes: toukwaws ikins bwein, takagayals inounas bwein, toulepels kulivis ibwein, takakons iliganes livan, takanigs ikits vayuwein, o tasiyas tasimavs bo inganegs agulivan bwanabwein. Gamag mwasanin idokes gunawotet nag ibwein, tage kalisiy ikalin nuwes waseg yey, mo bimwa̱saws tasiyas. E, kuneis, kudibakes Yon mamagin.”
<range>
Yon inavamul iyums ineis, mo Yeisuw isilamaw liva̱nen Yon, idibakes gamag babaw, ilana, “Aveiyag silma̱nin bo kuneis wanawoud? Bukukines amweilok giligil, yag itow mo iguwen, ne? Adok nag.
“Tage aveiyag silma̱nin bo kuneis wanawoud? Bukukines taw teitan anakweim maynamnabwein, ne? Adok nag. Peinan tasiyas asikweim singay maynamnabwein, abes bwanabwein king sibunatum wanuwan.
“Tage aveiyag silma̱nin nukuneis wanawoud? Adok bukukines palopit, ne? Magen! Peinan mtowen Yon ilisawes tasiyas palopits.
“Liva̱nen mtowen Bukitab waseg mamagina: ‘Bo bakayeb towen bikokew agulivan, bimgwayeim yak, bikaleil muked.’
“Mounid mtowen Yon ikalisawes gamag babaw wadaban pwepway; tage Yowbad nakaleiwag wanuwan asibabaw imugwas; Yon ikuyeim.”
Iliganes Yeisuw anilivan towen, tasiyas takaweins ta̱kis sisiyas gamag babaw; ikavasis Yowbad, peinan bo itams waseg Yon inageiguy, ibapta̱yses tasiyas. Tage tasiyas Palisiy sisiyas tassinaps bo ipiyaves Yowbad nanon pines tatineis, o Yon nag ibapta̱yses tasiyas.
<range>
Yeisuw mo ilivan, ilana, “Ama̱wan bakabebay va̱gan bukukwakins gudwouvaws yakamiy amisinap ama̱wan? Adok yakamiy ma̱wana gamagal iwliwals wavtakon ven, idibakes sisiyas, ilansa, ‘Kawaway kup tage nag kusilasals; ikous, mo kalloupid tage nag kuva̱lams.’
<range>
“Peinan tabapta̱ysein gamags Yon neim, nag ikam kan tonen, nag imwamoum wayn, mo kulansa ‘Takabala̱wein mtowen peinan baloum iweiy.’ Tage Gimgilitoun yey nam akamkwam, amwamoum, mo kulansa ‘Taw towen tagovek, ikamkwam o imwamoum avakaein, ikanubeins siney tasiyas takaweins ta̱kis o tasiyas takalbalebs.’
<range>
“Tage misinaka Yowbad nitun ikakins ansinap mounid.”
Palisiy teitan bo idow Yeisuw bein ikams son. Itam, isiw Palisiy wanbunatum, isin.
Isin, mo vinen ven towen ansinap kalbaleb iligen Yeisuw neisiw beikam Palisiy towen wanbunatum, mo ikow natagon wanuwan botol kakit, inow, itamanaw watibwelon Yeisuw, kaken walasin, ivva̱lam. Ivva̱lam, iwta̱wout mitinagin, ininein wakaken. Ikous, mo kunun vayvayov ikow wanaman, itanob. E, iviyom kaken, peinan singay ikalin nuwan; mo iptum natagon waseg.
<range>
Tage tanuwagan bunatum, Palisiy mtowen ikin vin mana̱wen. Nanon waseg ivtok livan, ilana, “Kukin Yeisuw palopit bo bikakin kal vin mana̱wen ikabkwen won o bikakin ansinap kalbaleb.”
Iw to Yeisuw, ikatimop nanon, ilana, “Saymon, kweitan youd badibakeim yak.” Saymon ikatimop, ilana, “Aw-youd bukwatimlakeig?”
Yeisuw mo ikabebay, ilana, “Tamwey teitan waseg, asteiy gamag sikawlavag, teitan lakatunim kina, tayuwein sinawanim kina.
“Asteiy nag ivag money waseg bimapus sikawlavag; mapuna iwidis iyakousis. Am-towen bikalin nuwan singay waseg?”
Iw to Saymon, ilana, “Adok mtowen nakawlavag avakaein niwid iyakous.” Yeisuw ilana, “Magen.”
Mo itouvin bikin vin mana̱wen, idibek Saymon, ilana, “Kukin vin mana̱wen. A̱siw am wambunatum, nag yevagam kusekeig bawid kakeig; tage mana̱wen mitinagin bo idal kakeig mo itanob kunun waseg.
“Na̱siw nam wambunatum, nag kumuloul waseg yey, tage mana̱wen vin isap ivviyom kakeig ee... nag iyakous.
“Nag tagon kuptum kunug, tage mana̱wen vin bo iptum kakeig natagon mul waseg.
“Mapun ansinap babaw kalbaleb bo awid bo ikous, mo ikalin nuwan avakaein; tage kukin kal bawid ansinap kakit kalbaleb, mo bikalin nuwan kakit.”
Yeisuw mo idibek vin mana̱wen, ilana, “Amsinap kalbaleb bo awid, bo ikous.”
Siney nikamkwams mo illivans sisiyas, ilansa, “Kal mtowen biwid gamag asisinap kalbaleb?”
Tage Yeisuw idibek vin, ilana, “Nukusimounid waseg yey mapuna bo kubwein. Kunoun kun niwal waseg.”
Yam mwasanin wankuyeim mo ita̱vin ven babaw wasigeis, iggeiguy, o isekes anilivan bwanabwein, Yowbad inakaleiwag liva̱nen. Siney inavamul sinwatan teiy, sisiyas vinay mwasanin issekes kaeis yam katanok katanok ikams. Vinay tasiyas Yeisuw nivag mo ibweins kweiboug askatoun, peinan yeiluw niyagages. Na̱tan Meliy nididawes Magda̱lein, bo nikayeb yeiluw teinim teiy waseg, mo ilisawes, bo ibwein.
<range>
Nayuwein vin yagan Yowan, Susa nakwav, mtowen tamtakavatein Elod nabunatum. Natounun Susana. Tasiyas sisiyas vinay babaw sivavag sam; issekes kaeis Yeisuw siney navamul yam katanok katanok ikams.
Wankuyeim ven babaw gimgilis ikatuyouns inekes Yeisuw, gamag singay babaw, inakabebay mo isekes, ilana:
“Talavein kaytul wit ispusoup wa̱bag. Ilivelov ee... kaytul mwasanin ikalka̱louw ininein wa̱ked. Gamag mo inounas ivva̱nis kaytul tasiyas, mo man iyoyows imimeis, ikikines, ikamkoums ikamiyeivis.
“Kaytul mwasanin ikalka̱louws ininein wadikuda̱kul, isibwa̱sobs, mo ka̱las ikalin, ikalayyag; peinan nag ivag pwepway-nen.
“Kaytul mwasanin ikalka̱louw ininein wapwepway son doudiw kaytul-nen. Son doudiw isibwa̱sobs; kasiyas doudiw bo iwkuva̱kaeins, mapuna wit iguya̱gweys.
“Tage kaytul mwasanin ikalka̱louw ininein pwepway bwanabwein, isibwa̱sobs, iwkuva̱kaeins. Kaytul katanok ivag anagin lakatutan.” Ilivan ikous, mo ilivan, aygan avakaein, ilana, “Kal yak sam teigam, bweina kuligen.”
Inavamul mo ikatugans waseg Yeisuw, sivines kid bikakins silawun kabebay.
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Yowbad bo itam wasigeis yakamiy va̱gan bukukwakins nakaleiwag sinapun, nisowum wasigeis babaw gamag. Tasiyas gog misinaka kabebay biliganes, Bikikines, nag gog biba̱nes silawun; o biliganes, nag gog bikakins silawun.
“Silawun kabebay towen mamagina: kaytul ma̱wana liva̱nen Yowbad.
“Kaytul kasiyas wa̱ked ma̱wana tasiyas iliganes, waninous nises, mogo Seitan isap ikwey livan towen; matage isimounids Yowbad ankatuneib silma̱nin.
“Kaytul kasiyas wadikuda̱kul ma̱wana tasiyas iliganes liva̱nen Yowbad, imwa̱saws-wan, tage nag isob wanuwes, tut kadilakus isimounids ee... Seitan iyakwanes mo ikalows.
“Kaytul kasiyas ikalka̱louws son doudiw kaytul-nen ma̱wana tasiyas iliganes, inounas ee... ininuways livan towen son ven watinow ankanuway, o ininuways ven watinow mwa̱saw-nen; mapuna liva̱nen Yowbad nag ivag anagin.
“Tage kaytul towen wasapon ma̱wana tasiyas asisinap bwanabwein, iliganes livan, iyyousis ikimtuwes, o ikaptules, mo ivag angis bwanabwein.
“Nag kal bivakanot lamp, mo loutan bikatigubweil wakunuwatan, o nag bisen lamp waskawan keb, nag; tage bisen wanakaew wakaban, mo tasiyas bisousiws wanuwan bunatum towen mo bikines mititeilin.
“Peinan sinap babaw nisowmes nisesun-wan, igaw mo bikamat, wakamnat.
“Kuvna̱seimiy va̱gan bukuliganes bwein. Kukin kal navavag sam, mo bikatimweis bibabaw. O kukin navavag nag, mo bikwey aveiyag idok nises. Mounida beidev mtowen.”
Inan siney Yeisuw budan mo binekes, nag gog, peinan gamag babaw katikunouks isibwades ked.
Teitan gamag ikow livan, ikaypwa̱lal in, idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Inam siney budam nitowas watoulan, sivines bikineims.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, idibakes, ilana, “Kalisiy yakamiy bukuliganes liva̱nen Yowbad o bukutams waseg, yakamiy mamagina inag o budag yakamiy.”
Yam kweitan, itouws wa̱wag siney navamul, idibakes, ilana, “Tadopels, taneis palata dadan yevagam towen.” Mo ikuks.
Ikuks ee... bo imasis Yeisuw. Bwaw kweitan mo ilivatus; iwaweiy wag, yevagam bo neinay-o; kakita bimukuls. Bo igak.
Inekes Yeisuw, iwgunis, ilansa, “Tamwey, bo bitamta̱mats.” Iligen, ikit, ikan yag, ika̱nes kaysay tasiyas kuva̱kaein, mo iyenom. Niwal avakaein.
Yeisuw mo idibakes, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun amipwa̱yat? Adok nag kunmiseigs, ne, va̱gan balabeimiy?” Bo iwenes tasiyas, isom ninous, sisiyas wasigeis illivans, ilansa, “Adok kweitan gamag towen, idibakes yag son kaysay, mo ikanawes aygan!”
Ikuks ee... ilugs min-Gelasin wasiven. Galiliy palatan, Gelasin palatan.
Ilugs, Yeisuw in wanakaew mo ilivet gimgeilin ven towen; yeiluw neiweiys taw towen. Yam babaw nag issikam anakweim, nag ivag nabunatum. Sona mwadoyan nimmasis wakalawag.
Mtowen im, ikin Yeisuw, mo iwak, ikalivatow, imasis kantukov wamatan Yeisuw, aygan avakaein waseg iyowal, ilana, “Aveiyag bukunuwakeig yey? O ya̱koum Yeisuw, Yowbad Tatawtoun Natun ya̱koum. Beitay! Awoum bukuyagageig, ne?”
Peinan Yeisuw bo nidibek yeiluw towen va̱gan bilisow taw. O peinan tut babaw yeiluw niwaweiys-wan mo ikabala̱wein, o gamag niyousis, imtakavates. Naman, kaken niyawanis tawtoun waseg, tage bo iwlitun; o yeiluw kawsep isawl in wanawoud; singaya iyageg gamag towen.
Yeiluw igilagel waseg Yeisuw ikous, mo Yeisuw ikatugan, ilana, “Ami-yagam?” Ilana, “Kamimet,” peinan yeiluw babaw neisiws wawnuwan.
Siyas yeiluw mo igilagels waseg Yeisuw, ilansa, “Awoum kwayabem bakan wa̱leg, ne?”
Bwaloud babaw nikamkwams awuyow a̱ne wakaytet nitatos; siyas yeiluw igilagels, ilansa, “Tab kadilok baka̱siw bakanekes mansiyas bwaloud, ne?” Yeisuw itam.
Siyas yeiluw mo ilisawes taw, inekes bwaloud mo kabala̱weins, isisawls ikalka̱louws tigtageg, inineis wayvagam, iwgweles.
Tasiyas tamtakivateins bwaloud ikines, mo isawls ikamteles youd to nikines, inineis ven waseg o nawoud waseg.
Gamag babaw iliganes, isaps kid bikines; e, imekes Yeisuw, iba̱nes taw towen, bo nilisawes yeiluw. E, isin Yeisuw walasin, anakweim bo isikam, nanon bo idumwal; mapuna iwenes.
Tasiyas nikines mo ikamteles, ilansa, “Taw towen takabala̱wein, yeiluw neiweiys, Yeisuw gog idibakes mo yeiluw ilisawes, o taw towen bo ibwein.”
Ven walasin Gelasin gimgilis iliganes, ininitougs waseg Yeisuw, sivines kid Yeisuw beiyum; peinan aspwa̱yat avakaein. Mo itouw wa̱wag, iyum.
Mtowen neibwein yeiluw waseg mo initoug waseg Yeisuw, ilana, “Soug yak bitatouw,” tage Yeisuw ikayeb, ilana, “Kuyum kun wambunatum; kwamtel Yowbad nasiwa̱youb waseg ya̱koum.” Mo inoun in ikamtilakes ven avakaein wawnuwan, mo ikakins Yeisuw nasiwa̱youb bwanabwein waseg.
<range>
Yeisuw iyum im Galiliy, gamag babaw nikaymates, mo imwa̱saws peinan bo iyum.
Takalawagein sinagog teitan yagan Yelos inek Yeisuw, ikulul wamatan, initoug waseg, ilana, “Kum wagunbunatum, kukin natug ikatoun avakaein.” Natun mana̱wen anbweilim sinwatan akweiy. Idokes kakita bikanig. Asteiy inounas, tage gamag singay babaw katuyouns imimekes, ipapeps Yeisuw wa̱won.
<range>
Na̱tan vin nises buya̱vin iwta̱wout sinwatan kweiy bweilim, tage nag kal ikakin bivag beimad.
Mana̱wen vin meinoy Yeisuw watibwelon, ikabkwen anakweim matan; nuwanaw buya̱vin mo imad.
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Kal ikabikon waseg yey?” Asibabaw ikayans, ikous, mo Pita idibek ilana, “Tamwey, gamag singay babaw ipapeps wa̱woum.”
Tage Yeisuw ilana, “Teitan gamag bo ikabikon waseg yey, peinan asimkwen guntawtoun bo ilisaweig, bo inek gamag towen.”
Vin mana̱wen ikakin ta-ma̱wan bisowm, itatat won, inek, ikulul wamatan, ika̱mat wamtes gamag babaw, ilana, “Peinan sivinag ba̱bwein, to nakabkwen anakweim matan; nuwanaw mo a̱bwein.”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Natug yak, nukusimounid waseg yey, mapuna bo kubwein. Ninabwein waseg kunoun.”
Igawa illivan, takaleiwag towen inagamag teitan imek, ilana, “Bo igeg! Natum bo ikanig. Awoum kweitan wotet kusek mtowen takatimlakay.”
Yeisuw iligen, iwa̱ge, ilana, “Awoum beivag ampwa̱yat. Bweina kusimounid va̱gan beibwein natum.”
Yeisuw mo isap wabunatum ilana, “Awoum babaw gamag bukusiws waseg yey. Adok Pita, Yon, Yemes, o gwad taman, inan. Misinak.”
Ikin tasiyas tavva̱lams ivva̱lams peinan loupid iva̱ges, ilana, “Awoum kuva̱lams. Na-ikanig gwad mana̱wen; immasis-wan.”
Tasiyas gog bo isiba̱wes, peinan ikakinsa bo ikanig.
Tage Yeisuw inek mana̱wen gwad, iyous naman, ilana, “Gwa! Kukit!”
Mo iyum kululuwan; nuwanawa ikit. Yeisuw mo ilana, “Kusek kan beikam.”
Tasiyas inan taman bo isom ninous, tage Yeisuw ilana, “Awoum kwamteles gamag biliganes sinap towen. Awoum.”
Mo idawes inavamul sinwatan teiy, imeis mo isekes sikaleiwag o sitawtoun wasigeis tasiyas bwagaw, baloum, katoun.
Mo ikayabes kid biggeiguys liva̱nen Yowbad nakaleiwag o biva̱ges va̱gan beibweins tasiyas takatouns.
Idibakes tasiyas, ilana, “Awoum kuneis kukwawes kunamiy, mikaytuk awoum, amikaw awoum, kaeimiy awoum, mimoney awoum; awoum mwaynatan kweim, awoum.
“Avei-bwan waseg bukusiws bukumsikes ee... mo bukunounas kuneis.
“Am-palawen nag beitams wasigeis yakamiy, bukulisawes ven towen mo musamusan pwepway wakikeimiy kwatsa̱pis bein waven mo bikakins Yowbad bimop asisinap.”
Mo inounas, ita̱vins ven katanok katanok waseg, iggeiguys livan bwanabwein o takatouns iva̱ges ibweins ven katanok katanok waseg.
Inounas ee... guyaw avakaein Elod iligen bulagan Yeisuw siney navamuls, bo isunasun nanon, peinan gamag mwasanin asilivan, ilansa, “Yon nikanig, bo ikit vayuwein.”
Tage mwasanin ilansa, “Ilaytiy bo isap.” O mwasanin ilansa, “Palopit kweiboug teitan bo ikit vayuwein.”
Elod iligen asilivan, ilana, “Yon bo abob kayon, tage kavel mtowen alligen nawotet bulagan, ivag ma̱wan?” Mo Elod sivinan bikin.
Iyakousis siwotet tasiyas Yeisuw nikayabes, mo iyums, imekes Yeisuw mo ikamteles siwotet liva̱nen. Mo Yeisuw itokes tasiyas-wan ineis ven yagan Beteseid.
Gamag babaw iliganes mo ikikunis. Yeisuw ikines, itam wasigeis; isekes liva̱nen Yowbad nakaleiwag, o takatouns tasiyas ivag mo ibweins.
Iwwotet ee... bo ikwayav, tasiyas sinwatan teiy inekes, ilansa, “Kwayabes gamag babaw, bineis ven mwasanin o bineis nawoud waseg, kaeis biba̱nes o bimasis, peinan ven towen makawan.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, idibakes, “Kusekes kaeis beikams.” Ilansa, “Yakamey kaem misinaka bled kweinim son in mwanay, tage nag kadilokes asibabaw beikams. Adok bakan waven bakagimwal kaeis bakamey, beikams, ne?”
Tawaw babiweis mamagina kweinim tawsan. Yeisuw mo idibakes navamul, ilana, “Kudibakes tasiyas bisinis bod kweitan kweitan waseg. Kweitan bod sinwanim gamag, kweitan bod simwanim gamag.”
Iva̱ges ma̱wan mo isinis asibabaw-wan.
Ikous, Yeisuw mo ikow bled kweinim son in mwanay, itamnow kayon, ikin walba̱lab, anilivan bwanabwein isek, silma̱nin kan towen, mo ikikivis, issekes navamul, ikawes, isenas wamtes gamag babaw.
Asibabaw ikams ikamuweips; mo isiyavis kan nikambwages nises, gamwat sinwatan gibsiy.
Kweitan tut siney navamul mtowen Yeisuw anmwa̱net initoug waseg Yowbad; ikous, mo ikatugan wasigeis tasiyas ilana, “Gamag babaw idokeigs kal yey?”
Ikatimapus aygan, ilansa, “Tabibapta̱ysein gamags Yon adok; o mwasanin idokeims Ilaytiy; o mwasanin idokeims kweiboug palopit teitan ya̱koum nukukit vayuwein.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Age yakamiy, kudokeigs kal yey?” Pita ikatimop aygan, ilana, “Ya̱koum Kelis, Yowbad nikayabeim nukum bukwatinabwem.”
Tage Yeisuw anilivan tawtoun isekes, ilana, “Awoum kwamteleigs wasigeis gamag mwasanin.” Ilana, “Gimgilitoun yey, kadiloka a̱bag bigeg singay, o tammwayas bipiyaveigs sisiyas tanuwgwes lun o tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag. Ikous mo bikatimateigs; yam kweitoun mo ba̱kit.”
<range>
Yeisuw idibakes asibabaw, ilana, “Kukin kal bikikun waseg yey, kadiloka bipiyev mwamovan tatonen, anklos bikokew yam katanok katanok mo bibkunig.
“Kalisiy yakamiy bikayus mwamovan tatonen igaw mo biyamkwen, tage kukin biyamkwen mwamowan peinag yey mo bises bwein.
“Kukin kal bikow youd babaw nisesus wadaban pwepway, mo biyamkwen mwamovan tatonen; tage nag bimwa̱saw mtowen, nag.
“Kukin kal beivag anmwasin peinan iligen agulivan o peinan gungamag mtowen, igaw Gimgilitoun yey ba̱yum bam ven watinow mo beivag agumwasin waseg gungamag towen. Peinan igaw ba̱yum bam, yakawanag waseg, o Tamag yakawanan waseg, o tasiyas nataka̱yobs yakawanes waseg.
“Mounid adibakeimiy mwasanin yakamiy nukutomos, nag bukukwanigs ee... mo bukukines Yowbad nakaleiwag.”
Yam kweinim kweitoun ikous, itokes siney asteitoun, Pita, Yon, Yemes, ikatulags ineis wa̱koy va̱gan binitougs waseg Yowbad.
Yeisuw ininitoug ee... ankakin iviwl ivag kweitan-wan, anakweim-vak bo ilapupwa̱kaw singay.
Asteiy sisiy Yeisuw bo isaps, illivans. Mtasiyas Moses son Ilaytiy bo isaps, kamnat avakaein waseg. Illivans sisiy Yeisuw liva̱nen nakanig igaw mo bilivet Yelusalem waseg.
<range>
Pita siney tasiyas bo imasis ikangagays mo ikits, ikines sikamnat tasiyas Yeisuw siney tasiyas asteiy.
Tasiyas asteiy bo beiyums, Pita idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Tamwey, bweina bitasesus towen. Bo bakawlul bunatum kweitoun, bunatan yak, bunatan Moses, bunatan Ilaytiy.” Ta-ivag silawun; makava ilivan Pita.
Igaw illivan, lov kweitan im ilumwes; tasiyas wanuwan, bo iwenes.
Aygan teitan wanuwan lov iliganes, ilana, “Mtowen Natug bwanabwein. Bweina bukuliganes aygan!”
Ilivan ikous, mo ikines Yeisuw anmwa̱net nises. Youd towen nikines bo isowmes. Misiya̱mun towen nag ikamteles gamag wasigeis, nag.
Iyam nen ga̱boug Yeisuw siney nagamag iwloubus ineis watinow, inounas mo inekes gamag babaw bo nimimeis.
Teitan siney tasiyas iwak, ilana, “Tamwey, kukin natug kuda̱taw. Peinan natug anmwa̱net-wan, yeiluw iwaweiy, isiblut waseg, iwak, itatat won mo ika̱poul wadon, mo bigulek won. Nag biyeiwas waseg.
<range>
“Bo anitoug wasigeis muvamul va̱gan bikayabes yeiluw, tage nag kadilokes.”
Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Takakon yakamiy. Bo kawegweis woug wasigeis yakamiy. Natum kumey bakin.”
Bimeyes kid gwad towen Yeisuw waseg, mo yeiluw iweiy, igulek won, itatat; tage Yeisuw ikan yeiluw towen, ikayeb, mo ibwein gwad; mo iyamen isek taman.
Asibabaw bo isom ninous peinan nikines Yowbad natawtoun. Ikines nawotet babaw, isunasun ninous ee... mo Yeisuw idibakes navamul ilana, “Livan towen kuninuways beibwein, peinan igaw mo bisilkodeigs, Gimgilitoun yey, va̱gan gamag beiweigs.”
<range>
Tage nag ikakins silawun anilivan towen, mamagina bo isowm wasigeis, va̱gan nag bikakins. Bo igoulus, aspwa̱yat gog bikatugans waseg towen, va̱gan silawun bikakins.
Wankuyeim mo ikamnimans sisiyas, sivines kid bikakins kal bikow yagan avakaein mo bimlavag astamumug.
Tage Yeisuw ikakin sikanuway, mo itok gwad teitan, isen wadadan, idibakes, ilana, “Kal yak bukutam waseg gwad towen peinan agugwamag, bo kutam waseg yey; o kal yak bukutam waseg yey bo kutam waseg towen nikayabeig nam, mtowen Tamag. Kalisiy tamumug wasigeis yakamiy? Mounid siyas takekels bimgwayeimiy; guyawaw nag.”
<range>
Iwa̱ge Yon ilana, “Tamwey, nakakin taw teitan nikayabes yeiluw yagam waseg, mo kasibwed, peinan nag sidayas mtowen.”
Yeisuw gog ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Awoum kusibwades. Kukin kal nag bisibwadeimiy bo ilabeimiy.”
Wankuyeim kakita bilivet tutan beimwen bein wanakaew, mo itamanaw silma̱nin bein Yelusalem. Bo ikayabes nagamag mwasanin va̱gan binounas wamatan bineis kweitan ven Samaliy gimgilis bidibakes, bilansa, “Kwatunags. Matovek wankuyeim mo beim.”
<range>
Tasiyas gog min-Samaliy bo ipiyaves Yeisuw, peinan bein Yelusalem.
Siyas inavamul Yemes son Yon ikines bo nipiyaves, ilansa, “Guyaw, tab sivinam bakadibek kov bikalivatouw walba̱lab bigabus tasiyas, ne?”
Tage Yeisuw itouvin, ika̱nes, ilana, “Awoum.” Mo inounas, ineis ven kweitan.
<range>
Inounas wa̱ked, teitan taw idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Babkunim ampalawen bukun.”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Awuk sibunatum wakiwmawum, o mansiyas man sibunatum wakamweilok, tage Gimgilitoun yey ta-ivag abkunug bamasis.”
Yeisuw idibek tayuwein, ilana, “Kubukunig yey.” Iwa̱ge towen, ilana, “Tab kadilok bakaymet tamag ee... beikous, bikanig, bakadibwen, mo baw.”
Yeisuw gog ilana, “Tamam ga-ises; bikanig, tatineis bidibwanis; tage yak, kun kugeiguy liva̱nen Yowbad nakaleiwag.”
Tatounun gamag ilana, “Babkunim gunguyaw yak; tage wanamug ban amuloul wasigeis agugwamag waven nisesus.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Kukin kal bikavaveis, tage bitouvin beiyey wankuyeim, mtowen nag kadilok Yowbad nakaleiwag, nag.”
Wankuyeim siwotet Yeisuw isekes-vak inagamag sinwanim sinawey, ikayabes va̱gan bineis bimugwas, asteiy asteiy, bineis ven katanok katanok. Tasiyas bimugwas; Yeisuw bitita̱vin wankuyeim.
Idibakes, ilana, “Kan bitata̱yoys singay babaw, tage tawteleins bag nag ibabaws. Kadiloka kunitougs waseg tanuwagan ta̱yoy va̱gan bikayabes nagamag mwasanin bilabeids inata̱yoy waseg.
“Bo akayabeimiy, ma̱wana sip nitsiyas yakamiy, bukunekes tasiyas mamagina awuk takananeiys.
“Awoum amikaw kukokews, awoum gamwat, awoum sandol; awoum bukulouvats gamag wa̱ked, bukukwaypuls; awoum.
“Aw-bunatum bukusiw wawnuwan, wanmugwana bukulivan Yowbad yagan waseg, kulana, ‘Niwal biwekeimiy yakamiy.’
“Kukin tanuwagan bunatum ansinap niwal, mo beitaw nuwan mtowen; kukin gog nag, amilivan bwein mo beiyum wasigeis yakamiy.
“Aw-bunatum waseg bukusikes, aveiyag bisekeimiy bweina kukwams o kumoums. Peinan tawteleins wotet yakamiy, kadiloka kukwams wotet anagin. Awoum kwaninapels bunatum kweitan kweitan.
“Kukin bukusunaps kweitan ven o taginvens beitams wasigeis yakamiy, kaeimiy bisekeimiy bweina kukwams; o takatouns kuva̱ges beibweins; o kudibakes tasiyas, kulansa, ‘Yowbad nakaleiwag bo isap wasigeis yakamiy.’
<range>
“Tage kukin bukusunaps kweitan ven o towous nag beitams wasigeis yakamiy, kulivans wavtakon ven, kulansa, ‘Kapiyaveimiy yakamiy, simiyas musamusan pwepway wakikem kakatsap bininein wamiven; tage kadiloka kuninuways Yowbad nakaleiwag, peinan bo isap wasigeis yakamiy.’
<range>
“Adibakeimiy, igaw Yowbad bimop ven babaw asisinap kalbaleb, ven Sodom mapun bilivatus kalbaleb, tage ven towen bipiyaveimiy mapun singay kalbaleb bilivatus.
“Yakamiy min-Kolasin, o min-Beteseid yakamiy, singay kalbaleb bukulivatus. Nukukines gunawotet tawtoun, tage nag kupiyaves amisinap kalbaleb. Kukin kweiboug min-Ta̱yil o min-Sidon bikines gunawotet tawtoun mogo bigeg ninous bipiyaves asisinap kalbaleb, bikumus wous son asikweim kalbaleb, gunugoun, o adok sewed, peinan bikakinsa asisinap kalbaleb.
“Igaw Yowbad bimop ven babaw sikalbaleb, tasiyas min-Ta̱yil o min-Sidon bilivatus mapun sikalbaleb, tage yakamiy singay kalbaleb bukulivatus.
“O yakamiy-vak min-Kapaneyum kudokes bukumwens kuneis walba̱lab, adok bukubus bukuneis watinow.”
Ikous anilivan towen, mo idibakes navamul, ilana, “Kukin kalisiy biliganes agamiy, biliganesa aygag. Kukin gog kalisiy bipiyaveimiy, bipiyaveigs yey. Kalisiy tasiyas bipiyaveigs, bo ipiyaves Tamag, towen nikayabeig nam.”
Tasiyas sinwanim sinawey ineis, iwotets ma̱wan, mo iyums, imwa̱saws avakaein, ilansa, “Tamwey, yagam waseg kadibakes siyas bwagaw, mo ikilovs sinap kalbaleb waseg.”
Yeisuw gog idibakes, ilana, “Bo akin Seitan walba̱lab ikalivatouw ma̱wana kavikawn, in watinow.
“Bo asekeimiy mikaleiwag va̱gan bukuvtakus mwatets sisiyas bobos bwabwels, tage nag bigadeimiy; mo bukutawtouns waseg Seitan inakaleiwag babaw.
“Tage silawun mimwa̱saw nag peinan tasiyas bwagaw ikanawes agamiy. Silawun mimwa̱saw peinan Yowbad bo nilel yigamiy walba̱lab.”
Misiya̱mun towen Yeisuw bo imwa̱saw Yowbad Kululuwan Bwanabwein waseg, ilana, “Kalin nuwag Tamag ya̱koum, ven watinow son liba̱lab sitovek ya̱koum, peinan nukusowm sinap towen, awoum tasiyas tassinaps bikakins, misinaka siyas ninous ma̱wana pwa̱pwaw. Mounid, Tamag, ma̱wan nanoum tatoneim bwanabwein.
“Tamag bo itam youd babaw waseg yey. Nag kal ikakin Natun; misinaka Tamag. Nag kal ikakin Tamag; misinaka Natun yey, sigwey kalisiy sivinag bakamtel wasigeis mo bikakins Tamag.”
Mo itouvin idibakes navamul, tasiyas-wan idibakes, ilana, “Tamumwa̱saws tasiyas, kalisiy mites bikines sinap towen nukukines.
“Mounid adibakeimiy, kweiboug palopit babaw sisiyas guyawaw babaw ivag sivines bikines sinap towen nukukines, nag gog ikines. O tasiyas sivines biliganes sinap towen nukuliganes nag gog iliganes.”
Wankuyeim tassinap teitan inek Yeisuw, idoki biyakwen; ilana, “Takatimlakay yak. Aveiyag yey bavag va̱gan mwamovag bises bisigeg?”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Kuninuway Moses nakaleiwag. Aveiyag nilel?”
Ikatimop, ilana, “Kadiloka kusiwyoub Guyaw Yowbad, a̱teim waseg, kululuwam waseg, mutawtoun waseg o nanoum waseg; o kuvnas-vak soum ma̱wana kuvna̱seim tatoneim.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Magen! Kukin bukuvag ma̱wan mo bukumov.”
Tage taw towen, idok ansinap tonen didumwal, ikatigan Yeisuw, ilana, “Kavel soug bavnas?”
Yeisuw ikatimop anilivan, ikabebay, ilana, “Teitan taw meinoy neim Yelusalem, iwloubus bein Yelikow. Ininoun ee... tavveinaws mwasanin ituts iweis, iyousis taw towen, ikawes anakweim, iwaweiys ikous, mo ilisawes taw towen immasis, bo katimlowus won.
“Yam towen tanuwagan lun teitan idoki biwloubus ked towen waseg, inoun ee... iwekey mtowen taw nimmasis wa̱ked, nag inek, ilisow ises, inoun-wan.
“Livay tabun teitan mo iwloubus iwekey mtowen nimmasis wa̱ked, ikin, nago inek, ilisow ises, inoun-wan.
“Tage gum-Samaliy teitan, ininoun, iwekey nimmasis wa̱ked, ikin, ikalin nuwan, inek, iyakit, ikabiyuv ansasok waseg antagon son wayn, mo isumweil. Ikous mo inup, isen a̱len donkiy watapwan, ivakaben donkiy, inow bunatum kweitan nises wa̱ked, mo ivnas wabunatum.
<range>
“Iyam nen ga̱boug, mo ikow akweiy kina, isek tanuwagan bunatum, ilana, ‘Kuvnas gamag towen beibwein; o kukin money towen nag kadilok, igaw ba̱yum bam bamop.’”
Yeisuw mo ilivan, ilana, “Gamag asteitoun iwekes sisiy nimmasis wa̱ked; tage kal ivnas?”
Iwa̱ge towen, ilana, “Adok towen ikalin nuwan, mo ileb.” Yeisuw mo idibek, ilana, “Ya̱koum kun, bukuwtel ma̱wan.”
Yeisuw siney nagamag inounas oko isaps kweitan ven; na̱tan vin Ma̱lid itam nabunatum, anbwabwal tasiyas.
Ma̱lid bwadan Meliy isin Yeisuw wadadan, iligen nakatimlakay.
Mana̱wen Ma̱lid ivag kaeis beikams, inawotet singay babaw, mapuna inek Yeisuw, ilana, “Guyaw, ta-bukukin bwadag nilisaweig agumwa̱net bavag kaeimiy bukukwams. Kudibek beim bilabeig.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Ikubukub nuwam peinan nanoum babaw, tage kweitan sinap ika̱bwag waseg ya̱koum. Meliy gog sivinan sinap towen bwanabwein; iligen aygag. Bweina bises bikatiluteg agulivan.”
<range>
Ven kweitan waseg Yeisuw bo ikulul, ininitoug waseg Yowbad; ikous, inavamul teitan idibek, ilana, “Tamwey, kwatimlakem bakanitoug waseg Yowbad; ma̱wan Yon nikatimlakes tasiyas inavamul.”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Bukunitougs, kulivans, kulansa: ‘Timem, bakagoul yagam. Mukwaleiwag beim.
Kaem bukusekem nagein.
Kunumlev amasinap kalbaleb, peinan yakamey kanumlev gamag asisinap kalbaleb wasigeis yakamey. Tage awoum bukusenam abiyokon waseg.’”
Mo idibakes, ilana, “Kal yak bukunek nubeim watapwan boug, bukulana, ‘Gwa, kusekeig bled kweitoun, agubwabwal beikam; peinan mwana isap, anamoun; ta-ivag kan basek beikam.’
<range>
“Nubeim adok wanuwan nabunatum bikatimop aygam, bilana, ‘Awoum kuvag mouvit waseg yey. Peinan koukwed bo akatibog, o nitug sigwey kamasis. Ta-ma̱wan basap basekeim.’
“E, nag bisap bisekeim peinan nubeim, nag. Tage peinan kusimkakin mo bisap bisekeim aveiyag sivinam.
“Adibakeimiy, bweina kunitougs, mo bisekeimiy. Kunineivs mo bukuba̱nes. Kugipits mo bikaliyow koukwed pinamiy yakamiy.
“Kukin kal binitoug, mo bisek. Kukin kal binineiv, mo biban. Kukin kal bigipit, mo bikaliyow koukwed peinan.
“Tawaw yakamiy, kukin nitimiyas sivines in, bilivans, mwatet bukusekes beikams, ne? O kukin sivines pouw, bilivans, kadilayuy bukusekes, ne? Adog nag. E, takalbaleb yakamiy, kukwakins aveiyag bwein bukusekes nitimiyas. Yowbad ansinap bwein. Bukunitougs waseg mtowen, singay mo bisekeimiy Kululuwan Bwanabwein.”
<range>
<range>
Teitan gamag bo ipiyev livan, peinan yeiluw neisiw wa̱won; Yeisuw ikayeb, ikilev gamag towen mo ilivan bwein; o tasiyas iliganes bo isom ninous.
Tage mwasanin iyages Yeisuw ilansa, “Siyas tabbwagaws sitovek Seitan mtowen nileb Yeisuw, mo ikayabes yeiluw.”
O musinis-vak sivines biyakwanes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Kwamtilakem Yowbad naman mulin, bakakin.”
Yeisuw gog ikakina ninous tasiyas, idibakes, ilana, “Kukin ven avakaein gimgilis bilivis biva̱ges bod kweitan kweitan, mo bigulekwes ven towen; o kukin gamag bilivis wawnuwan bunatum mo bigayays, singaya bigeg.
“O Seitan-vak, kukin inabod bilivis, inakaleiwag bikalivatow. Awoum kulansa, ‘Bwagaw ilabeim mo kukwayabes yeiluw’; awoum.
“Amilivan gog ma̱wan, tage kal ilabes mivamul mo ikayabes yeiluw? Kuninuways asisinap tasiyas mo bukukwakins bo ibol amilivan.
“Tage kuninuways, magat Yowbad ilabeig va̱gan bakayabes yeiluw, nakaleiwag bo isap wasigeis ya̱kids.
“Kukin tawtoun gamag bikokew naviy wuliyougwan ninamis waseg va̱gan bimtakavet nabwan tatonen, adok nag teitan biyageg nawliyoug. Tage kukin tayuwein gamag singaya tatawtoun mo bivvatay waseg, bitakayway, mo bikwey wuliyougwan naviy son nawliyoug babaw, bivgen bisekes inagamag.
<range>
“Kukin kal nag ilabeig bo isilbwadeig. O kukin kal nag ikatikunouk kan inow wagunseigous, mtowen bo ikatigey.
“Magat yeiluw bikilev gamag, mo bita̱van ven makaw, binineiv nakabiyeiwas. Binineiv nag, bilivan bilana, ‘Ba̱yum ban wagunbunatum to nalisow.’
“Beiyum biban nabunatum, bo itaneivis, youd babaw bo ilivkases bwein, bikalin nuwan, bein ikin siney teinim teiy asisinap singaya kalbaleb, tasiyas asibabaw mo beisiws wabunatum, bisesus bisigagas. Kweiboug gamag towen nakalbaleb peinan yeiluw neisiw, tage nakabiyokous waseg singaya kalbaleb.”
<range>
Yeisuw anilivan ma̱wan, na̱tan vin wawnuwes gamags, aygan ivakaein, idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Singay tamumwa̱saw mana̱wen vin nikopweim yak, o ivsasum.”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Nag, tasiyas taliganeins Yowbad aygan bimwa̱saws, o takanaweins aygan.”
Gamag singay babaw katikunouks nimeis waseg Yeisuw, mo idibakes, ilana, “Gudwouvaws yakamiy amisinap kalbaleb. Sivinamiy naman mulin Yowbad bukukines. Nag gog. Magat bukuninuways Youna waseg. Ma̱wan min-Ninavek kweiboug ikines Youna nawotet mamagina naman mulin Yowbad; ma̱wan Gimgilitoun yey, gunawotet kukines tut towen waseg.
<range>
“Igaw Yowbad biya̱tal wasigeis gamag babaw, mo kwin mana̱wen kweiboug inaven wa̱yals mo bilivan va̱gan bukukwakins amisinap kalbaleb gudwouvaws yakamiy. Peinan mana̱wen kwin inoun in singay kadiveiyov va̱gan biligen Solomon ansinap; tage sinap towen nagein nukuliganes ikalisow Solomon ansinap waseg.
“Min-Ninavek bitamanaws ya̱tal waseg, bilivans va̱gan bukukwakins amisinap kalbaleb gudwouvaws yakamiy. Peinan tasiyas iliganes Youna nageiguy mo ilaves asisinap kalbaleb; tage kaleiwag nagein nukuliganes ikalisow Youna nageiguy. Kuliganes; nag gog, nag kulaves amisinap kalbaleb.
“Lamp bitavakanot, awoum aveiyag bitakatugbulik, o awoum bitasen waskawan bunatum; awoum. Tage bitasen wateibol, mo tasiyas beisiws wabunatum bikines mititeilin.
“Woun mititelin mat. Kukin matam bwein mo woum meiveka bikamnat; kukin matam kalbaleb mo woum meiveka bidadub.
“Kuvna̱ses mititeilimiy, mata ge idadub.
“Kukin gog woum meiveka bikamnat, dadub nag, mo bukumlavag mamagina lamp kuva̱kaein mititeilin.”
Igawa illivan, Palisiy teitan inek, idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Kum, bitakams wagunbunatum”. Itam, inek beikams.
E, kakita beikams, Palisiy towen ikin Yeisuw nag iwid naman, bo igeg nanon, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun nag kuwid namam?”
Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Yakamiy Palisiy mamagina abmavin o kwa̱vig, kuwidis watoulan igimagim, tage wanuwan bikibik, kalbaleb, peinan amisinap kukkwayes gamag sivavag.
“Takabala̱wein yakamiy! Yowbad nibun kaleivids, nibun-vak nuwads.
“Wanuwamiy kadiloka kuva̱ges amisinap beibwein, kusiwa̱youbs gamag wasigeis, mo bukugimagims, o youd katanok katanok beibwein pinamiy yakamiy.
“Tage yakamiy Palisiy, singay kalbaleb bukulivatus. Kukwatkakils waseg miwliyoug babaw, kulagus sinawatan; kalgutan mo kusekes Yowbad. E, kulagus gayas siyas kekel, mamagina minit o luw, tage bo kunumlaves sinap didumwal son siwa̱youb waseg Yowbad. E, kadiloka kuvna̱ses sinap babaw, tage awoum bukuwidis sinap tasiyas avakaein.
“Yakamiy Palisiy, singay kalbaleb bukulivatus. Peinan tapwa̱loul waseg sivinamiy bukusinis wa̱keb, o sivinamiy gamag wavtakon ven beikoks wamitamiy binounas.
“Yakamiy Palisiy, singay kalbaleb bukulivatus. Amikakin bwein, tage wanuwamiy kalbaleb, ma̱wana alawag wanawoud, gamag bikanpeles tage nag ikakins takanig alawagan.”
Tassinap teitan idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Tamwey, amlivan towen waseg kuyagem-vak yakamey.”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Yakamiy-vak tassinap yakamiy, singay kalbaleb bukulivatus. Peinan mikaleiwag kusekes gamags singay moumouvit ma̱wana kunes kusekes avakaein, tage nag kakit bukukwawes va̱gan bukulabes, nag.
“Singay kalbaleb bukulivatus. Tibumiyas bo neiweiys siyas palopits mo kuwlules aluwgwes tasiyas palopits.
“Mapuna kukwakins o kutams waseg tibumiyas siwotet kalbaleb. Tasiyas neiweiys palopits o yakamiy kuwlules aluwgwes.
“Yowbad ansinap waseg ilivan ma̱wan, ilana, ‘Bakayeb palopits sisiyas aposols binekes, mo beiweiys mwasanin o bisilkodes mwasanin.’
“O tasiyas Yowbad inapalopit bo iwaweiys ven watinow. O wotet towen kalbaleb mapun bukulivatus gudwouvaws yakamiy, tut towen waseg.
“Yowbad nibun ven watinow o gamag siyas wanamug, teitan taw iweiy Yowbad nagamag towen Eibel. Yowbad inapalopit iwaweiys ee... nakabiyokous waseg mtowen Sekaliya, neiweys Yowbad wanbunatun, abeilun palatan, bunkakit palatan. E wotet towen kalbaleb mapun bukulivatus gudwouvaws yakamiy, tut towen waseg.
“Yakamiy tassinaps, singay kalbaleb bukulivatus. Kukwayuses awkwedan sinap, nag bukusiws yakamiy, tage kusilbwades tasiyas sivines kid beisiws. Ta-ma̱wan. Bo kusilbwades.”
Ilisow ven towen, mo Palisiy sisiyas tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag singay ivvaluts asilivan waseg, mamagina ivvasiganis; ikayamats waseg Yeisuw anilivan; kukin kalbaleb biliganes, mo biya̱tals.
<range>
Wankuyeim gamag singay babaw katuyouns nimeis; bo ikalawt ven, nitatos ipapeps-wan; mo isilamaw nakabebay wasigeis navamul, ilana, “Kuvna̱seimiy. Kadiloka kupiyaves tasiyas Palisiy asiyist. Peinan tayyaweid tasiyas Palisiy.”
Ilana, “Youd babaw nilumwes igaw mo bikaliyow, bikamat; o aveiyag nisisowmes, igaw mo bispuyes mo bikakins.
“Youd towen nukuliva̱nes dadub waseg, igaw biliganes wamnat; o aveiyag nukwatimwa̱lags wamibunatum igaw mo bilivans wavtakon ven.
“Sigwey, awoum kuwenes tasiyas beiweiys woumiy. Bikatimateimiy bo misinak. Nag aveiyag binuwakeimiy.
“Tage kadiloka kuwenes mtowen bikatimateimiy mo bilaveimiy bukuneis wa̱kov. Mounid bukuwenes mtowen.
“Skwa̱sik mwana̱nim, adok ten toya maysan; tage Yowbad ikikines; nag binumlev mwantanok, nag.
“Yowbad gog ikakin kunumiy nakasabwasob babewein nakavnivin. Awoum beivag amipwa̱yat, Yowbad ikakina mansiyas skwa̱sik, imtakavates; singay gog bimtakavateimiy yakamiy.
“Kukin kal yak bukwamtel wamtes gamag, kulana, ‘Mounid Yeisuw inagamag yey,’ wankuyeim yey Gimgilitoun yey mo bakamtel wamtes tasiyas Yowbad nataka̱yobs, balana, ‘Taw towen yey gunagamag.’
“Tage bukwaya̱neig wamtes gamag, mo bakaya̱neim wamtes tasiyas Yowbad nataka̱yobs.
“Kukin kal bitawyageig Gimgilitoun yey, Yowbad bweina biwid ansinap kalbaleb beikous; tage kukin bitawyeg Kululuwan Bwanabwein, Yowbad nag biwid ansinap kalbaleb, nag.
“Igaw biyousimiy, biyateleimiy wasinagog o wamtes tasiyas guyawaw o tasiyas takaleiwags, awoum beivag ninoumiy babaw. Awoum kulansa, ‘Ama̱wan bakatimop asilivan?’ Awoum kulansa, ‘Aveiyag balivan?’ Awoum.
“Yowbad Kululuwan Bwanabwein mo bikamtilakeimiy anilivan bukulivans tut towen waseg.”
Teitan taw wanuwes gamag babaw mo idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Takatimlakay yak, tuwag bo ikow nakiyay avakaein, kudibek mwasanin bisekeig gunkiyay yey.”
Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Adok awoum. Nag kal isekeig gunakaleiwag va̱gan bakaluweg mivavag.”
Idibakes tasiyas, ilana, “Kuvna̱seimiy. Awoum bimwamon mitamiy. Nag bitamwa̱saw peinan dawliyoug babaw. Silawun damwa̱saw kweitan.”
Kabebay kweitan idibakes, ilana, “Guyaw teitan inabag ivag kan singay babaw. Bo ika̱lawt seigous. Nanon ilana, ‘Aveiyag bavag? Peinan bo ika̱lawt seigous.’
<range>
“Ilana, ‘Adok bagulekwes seigous kweibougs, bawlulavaw bunavka̱veks, waseg basen kan babaw o youd katanok katanok.
“‘Beikous; nanoug mo balana: “O yey guyaw yey, kag babaw, bo kadilok bweilim babaw; bweina bayeiwas, bakamkwam, bamwamoum, bamwa̱saw.” ’
“Tage Yowbad idibek, ilana, ‘Takabala̱wein yak, boug towen bukumat, kululuwam toneim biyamkwaneim, mo kal bikow muvavag tasiyas nukwanlev?’
“Guyawaw mwasanin bo ma̱wan; sivines siwliyoug bikatimweisis bibabaw; tage wanuwes nag ivag Yowbad nawliyoug, nag.”
Mapuna idibakes navamul, ilana, “Awoum bikubukub nuwamiy silma̱nin mwamovamiy, aveiyag bukukwams. Awoum bikubukub nuwamiy silma̱nin woumiy, aveiyag bukusikams.
“Mwamovads nag mamagina kan; o wouds nag mamagina kweim.
“Kuninuways mansiyas bwayobway. Nag isapwes kan, nag itayoys binawes wasiseigous; tage Youbad imtakavates, isekes kaeis ikams, singay gog bimtakavateimiy yakamiy.
“Adok nag kal ya̱koum bukuninuway mutawtoun waseg mo beivag ambweilim bibabaw. Nag kadilok.
“Sinap towen kakit nag kadilokeimiy. Awoum bikubukub nuwamiy youd babaw silma̱nin.
“Kuninuways kasiyas moloubaw peinan isibwa̱sobs wadadan ked, nag iwotets, nag iba̱lals, nag. Tage astubub waseg ilisawes mtowen Solomon antubub kweiboug gamag nikavasis singay.
“O kasiyas kay, nagein mwamov wadadan ked, nubweig beimat, o gamag bikawes binawes bilaves bein wa̱kov. Peinan Yowbad isekes kay astubub kamnabwein singay mo bisekeimiy amikweim yakamiy. Adok nag kunmises Yowbad, va̱gan bisekeimiy kan, kweim.
“Awoum kuninuways aveiyag bukukwams o aveiyag bukumoums. Awoum bikubukub nuwamiy.
“Ven babaw gimgilis sivines youd tasiyas. Tamads ikakina aveiyag sivinamiy. Kadiloka bukuninuways Yowbad nakaleiwag, bukwanawes, mo bisekeimiy youd tasiyas.
<range>
“Awoum beivag amipwa̱yat. Yakamiy Yowbad alen yakamiy, mapuna bo itam va̱gan bukusiws wanuwan nakaleiwag.
“Kuymiyises miwliyoug, money kukwawes, kusiwyoubus tasiyas tasimavs; maysamiy walba̱lab mo bises bisigeg. Gamag nag biba̱kews waseg, o man kekel nag bikamkwams, o biyagages, nag.
“Ampalawen miwliyoug kwatikunakus, mo biseiw nuwamiy ven towen.
“Kadiloka kupa̱yiws o milamp bigidaged mamagina tasiyas nikaymates sitovek wasagal, veivay sigeilin; mtowen beiyum beim, bigipit; tasiyas biliganes, nuwanaw mo bikaliyowes koukwed. E, kadiloka kwayamats ma̱wana tasiyas.
<range>
“Igaw sitovek beim mo tasiyas tala̱lals mo bimwa̱saws, bipa̱yiw mtowen, bisekes abes bisinis, mo bimey kaeis beikams.
“Kukin beim watapwan boug o biba̱nes ila̱lals, mo bimwa̱saws; o kukin walalayis mo beim o biba̱nes ila̱lals, mo bimwa̱saws-vak tasiyas.”
Kweitan livan Yeisuw isekes mamagina, “Kuninuways tanuwagan bunatum; kukin bikakin asina̱vin tavveinaw beim, mo beilal, bisilbwed kid towen tavveinaw; awoum ge beisiw wanbunatum.
“Yakamiy ma̱wan, kadiloka kula̱lals, kukwaymateigs Gimgilitoun yey. Awoum balabuboleimiy; awoum.”
Pita ikatugan, ilana, “Tamwey, tabta mukwabebay towen silma̱nin yakamey, o adok gamag babaw?”
Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Kal natouwat tamwey bisek nawotet va̱gan bimtakavates inagamag, bisekes kaeis bikamkwams? Adok towen tatoukum o tassinap. Igaw natovek beiyum beim o biban inatoukum inawotet waseg, bilana, ‘Kalin nuwag ya̱koum, kadiloka kumtakavet gunwuliyoug babaw.’
<range>
<range>
“Tage kukin natouwat bilana, ‘Guntovek bo iyouviy, adok nag nuwanaw beim,’ mo biwaweiy inagamag, tawaw, vinay, o bimlavag tagovek, o bimwamoum tawtoun soup bikabala̱wein, mo natovek beiyum beim bilabubol natouwat, bimop ansinap kalbaleb, bisen wasigeis tasiyas takapidabs.
<range>
“Natouwat kavel ikakin natovek nanon, tage nag iwtel ma̱wan, o nag ikatunag, natovek mo biwaweiy avakaein.
“Tage kukin kal nag ikakin natovek nanon, mo iwotet kalbaleb, kadiloka natovek biwaweiy gamag towen, tage nag beiweiy bivakaein. Kukin kal natovek bisiwa̱youb avakaein waseg, kadiloka biwotet avakaein peinan. O kukin natovek bisek navavag babaw, sivinan gamag towen biwotet bivakaein peinan.
“Yey nam bavakanot kov wadaban pwepway, o sivinag nanawan bigidaged.
“Igaw mo bibapta̱yseig kweitan youd kalbaleb waseg, o sivinag nuwanaw biyakous.
“Awoum kuninuways yey nam silma̱nin niwal ven matinow. Nag. Yey nam silma̱nin abilivis bavag.
“Igaw bunatan bunatum wanuwan asteinim bilivis, asteitoun palatan, asteiy palatan.
“E, bilivis, taman palatan, natun palatan; o inan palatan, natun palatan; o asteiy vinay son yawan, na̱tan palatan, na̱tan palatan.”
Idibakes gamag babaw, ilana, “Magat bukukines lov isob wayavat, bukulansa, ‘Bo beikweis.’ E, mo ikweis.
“O magat bukukines yals itow, bukulansa, ‘Ka̱las beikal avakaein,’ mo beikal ka̱las.
“Tayyaweid yakamiy! Kukines liba̱lab, ven ankakin mo kukwakins aveiyag bikamat, tage nag kuwtusis Yowbad nawotet tut towen waseg.
“Aveiyag wawun nag bukukwakins sinap didumwal?
“Kukin kal biyateleim binaweim waseg takaleiwag silma̱nin ya̱tal; igaw wa̱ked kadiloka kuyokons va̱gan ninoumiy bukulatanes. Kukin gog nag, mo biyateleim wamatan towen takaleiwag, o takaleiwag bidibek plisman, bilana, ‘Kutok gamag towen kunow wa̱deil.’
“E, bukun wa̱deil, bukusesuna ee... anatut bukupa̱yin inapa̱yin meivek-wan beikous, mo bilikum bukusap wamnat.”
Misiya̱mun towen gamag mwasanin idibakes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Min-Galiliy mwasanin iwaweiys man iluns waseg Yowbad, mo Paylat iweiys gamag tasiyas, imta̱mats sisiyas mansiyas man neiweiys.”
Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Awoum kudokes min-Galiliy tasiyas asisinap singay kalbaleb mapuna imta̱mats. Nag. Min-Galiliy babaw asisinap kalbaleb; o yakamiy-vak, kukin nag bukulaves amisinap kalbaleb mo bukukwanigs ma̱wana tasiyas.
<range>
“Awoum kudokes min-Yelusalem tasiyas sinwatan teinim teitoun asisinap kalbaleb, mo bunatum bunaveiyov yagan Siloum ikalivatouw iwaweiys. Nag. Min-Yelusalem babaw asisinap kalbaleb; o yakamiy-vak, kukin nag bukulaves amisinap kalbaleb, mo bukukwanigs ma̱wana tasiyas.”
<range>
Yeisuw mo isekes nakabebay mamagina: “Taw teitan, wanabag nisop yaveinun nitet. Sivinan wuwan bikow; iwekey, nag.
“Idibakes tasiyas tawtelein bag, ilana, ‘Kweitoun bweilim aninek yaveinun makaywen, anineiv wuwan; nag. Kuteiy, awoum biteta mav, biyamkwen pwepway.’
“Ikatimop aygan, ilana, ‘Bweina ga itet bweilim towen. Bakaviyeil leis wadadan palavas, basen bulumakaw pwes. Kukin bweilim wamatads beiwuw wuwan, bo bwein. Kukin nag, mo bateiy.’”
<range>
Sa̱bat waseg, Yeisuw igeiguy wanuwan sinagog.
Na̱tan vin nises, sinwatan kweinim kweitoun bweilim ankatoun waseg tapwan idadog. Ta-ma̱wan bitamanaw bidamoms tapwan.
Yeisuw ikin, idibek, ilana, “Vin yak, bo kubwein, amkatoun waseg.”
Isen naman wa̱won, nuwanaw mo idamoms tapwan; mapuna ikaves Yowbad.
